SMB.name: Bayside
SMB.description: With flavorsome, international cuisine, guests from near and far enjoy the decadence of Bayside by day for buffet-style breakfast and lunch; and bask in its outdoor essence with dining by night for an exquisite a la carte French Brasserie experience. The character of Bayside's outdoor setting is charming, as guests can watch the sailboats passing, indulge in candlelit dinners, or see the fiery sunset; while indoor dining sets the tone for a more fanciful allure with French windows serving as the gateway to welcome in the cool, Sea breeze. Bayside is the place to indulge your palate with ever-changing daily buffet themes and plenty of made-to-order options. Savor the flavors of a flagship restaurant and toast to the distinct character of this lively seaside eatery, nestled just a short distance from the sparkling, Caribbean Sea.

SMB.name: Oleander
SMB.description: Seating up to 42 guests,this intimate, picturesque gem overlooks an endless waterscape. Inside, a beautifully appointed dining room with arched valances and Caribbean-inspired dÃ©cor celebrates what is truly unique about this restaurant. Representing the best in the rich, flavorful fare that Jamaica is known for, guests come to relax and enjoy the beauty of the ocean vistas. But what's best about The Oleander is the zest found in its unique dishes and the eccentric, culinary touches the chefs employ here. With illuminating dÃ©cor that makes you feel as if you are dining inside of an 18-century Great House, The Oleander's food is just as colorful as its furnishings.

SMB.name: Cucina Romana
SMB.description: Cucina Romana has a legacy that stretches back four generations. When our Italian chef moved to the Caribbean from Grado, Italy in 2011, he brought his generations-old culinary craft with him, carrying on a long-standing family tradition of cooking up authentic, Italian cuisine. Only the best ingredients are used in the special meals prepared at Cucina Romana, where our chef skillfully creates inspiring Italian favorites. From antipasti and minestre e ensalate, to primi piati favorites like Fettuccine Alfredo and Lasagna Napoletana, our chef uses fresh basil grown in a nearby, onsite garden and local tomatoes to season signature dishes. Second piati and delicious dolci round off the amazing menu choices. And it's location on the second floor location offers a 270-degree view of the ocean.

SMB.name: Tokyo Jo's
SMB.description: From miso soup, to teriyaki and sukyaki, enticing variety abounds at Tokyo Joe's-a beachfront restaurant sure to whet the appetite of anyone who gets a whiff of the pan-Asian style cuisine prepared right before their eyes. This popular restaurant plays on the concept of cooking Western-influenced food on a wok, using the spices and seasonings of East and Southeast Asia. Combining the flavors of the Orient with the spirit of the Caribbean, ingredients like snow peas, pak choy, callaloo, escallion, ginger, and garlic spice up the main entrees: seasoned, cooked-to-order meats and seafood served fresh with dan bings and steamed rice or noodles.

SMB.name: Stewfish
SMB.description: This open-air restaurant offers an impressive selection of authentic Caribbean cuisine such as West Indies Pepperpot Soup, Jamaican Pepper Shrimp, and Lobster Bouillabaisse. Stewfish presents a winning combination of flavorful food and inviting atmosphere where the fresh, open air adds to its undeniable charisma. It's the perfect place to relax and enjoy an authentic Caribbean meal amid Old English ambience, with thatched-style roofs and sand-lined walkways. With the beach just steps away, an after-dinner walk along the beach is inevitable. All who eat here can enjoy exquisite comfort food while enjoying the incomparable hospitality Jamaica is known for.
SMB.short_description: Discover The Bounty Of The Sea

SMB.name: Butch's Steak & Seafood
SMB.description: Ever since Sandals Resorts' Chairman opened his first resort, the name Gordon ''Butch'' Stewart has been synonymous with high-quality, luxury destinations. Butch's Steak & Seafood serves up only the highest quality grain-fed Midwestern beef together with the finest fish and seafood. Our hand-cut steaks, fish fillets and seafood are prepared your way, seasoned to perfection and accompanied by exquisite sides and flavorful sauces. Once you experience our unparalleled quality and luxury ambience you'll understand why we had to name it Butch's!

SMB.name: Dino's Pizzeria
SMB.description: After all, nothing says comfort food better than a warm slice of brick oven pizza made fresh with mozzarella, homemade tomato sauce, and tasty toppings. Dino's Pizzeria hits the spot anytime of day or night with oven-baked bread and choice toppings including Gorgonzola, pear, Brie, prosciutto, sausage, artichokes, seafood and more. On the surface, Dino's may look like a traditional pizza place but when you take a closer look, you'll find an incredible variety of pizza with some of the most unique combination of flavors sure to whet the palate of true pizza lovers.
SMB.short_description: Discover A Little Slice Of Heaven

SMB.name: The Mariner
SMB.description: From the very beginning, The Mariner Seaside Bar & Grill has been something special. A place where guests come for delicious, grilled food and a cold one, this beachside bar and grill doesn't disappoint. With traditional grilled delights such as grilled fish and burgers, a commonality among guests is to first enjoy the mouthwatering, flavorful food, and then take pleasure in a peaceful walk along the beach. Guests can also enjoy wraps, French fries, salad, and local favorites such as Jerk Chicken and Jerk Pork where peppery jerk and fiery scotch bonnet spices are used to season these local treasures. With a laid-back vibe characteristic of the Caribbean, this come-and-go grill is good time fun for everyone.
SMB.short_description: Discover A New Take On Happy Hour

SMB.name: CafÃ© de Paris
SMB.description: On most mornings, there is a cool breeze in the air, making enjoying a macadamia, amaretto, hazelnut, chocolate, vanilla, or raspberry hot or chilled latte all the more sweeter. Well into the afternoon, delighting in chocolate cream puffs, crÃ©me brulÃ©e tarts, cake, cookies and more, is enchanting. And, as the sun lowers in the sky and the air cools again, indulging in a warm crÃªpe with the topping of your choice is magical. CafÃ© de Paris combines the laidback Caribbean spirit with a smidgen of France's romantic, sweet life to give guests a little bit of Paris in the Caribbean.

SMB.name: The Jerk Shack
SMB.description: Believed to have originated with Jamaica's Arawak Indians, jerk cookery began as a preservation method. The Maroons of Jamaica, who once sought refuge in the island's Blue Mountains, eternalized the Arawak's ancient jerk technique by spicing or seasoning the meat, wrapping it in leaves, then placing it on hot rocks over a lattice of wood. This technique evolved with the use of different spices to the cooking style that we know today as Jerk. At the Jerk Shack, chefs apply the jerk cooking style using a marinade or paste that incorporates pimento (allspice) and scotch bonnet peppers.

SMB.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SMB.description: There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant tucked behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Oriental dÃ©cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. Giving guests a taste of the Far East with traditional and contemporary sushi creations, Soy is named after soy sauce, a customary ingredient in the art of sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Chefs skillfully prepare sushi using only the freshest ingredients. Guests can enjoy a nightcap or pre-dinner cocktail near the stone-lined fire pits, and inside, will discover great ambiance with the stone statues, pendant lighting, and mahogany furniture.
hours: Breakfast: Will be served in Bayside restaurant

SMB.name: Cricketer's Pint
SMB.description: Cricketer's Pint-home to mahogany, saloon-like dÃ©cor and lively bartenders-is a great place to completely relax and enjoy customary pub fare. Serving Shepherd's Pie, Fish and Chips, Bangers and Mash, and more, scrumptious pub food can be paired with a wide range of beers, wines, spirits, and soft drinks. It was, after all, the pub that first introduced the concept of the bar counter being used to serve beer. This 'pie and pint' pub however, brings a whole new meaning to pub life by offering a wide selection of refreshing ales including Guinness and Newcastle Brown ale, along with time-honored pub fare and delectable desserts all set against the beautiful, enchanting backdrop of Jamaica. Inviting, with cozy seating for two or for your whole group, it's hard to leave The Cricketers Pint.
SMB.short_description: Discover A Little Bit Of England

SRC.name: Royal Thai
SRC.description: Whether you're a lover of awe-inspiring architecture, lured by the mystery of the Orient, or a true foodie searching for the most unique exotic flavors, you'll be amazed by the character of offshore island restaurant, Royal Thai, where getting there is half the fun. A ride on an authentic dragon boat takes you to this distinctive island getaway - a destination in its own right. But the true star of Royal Thai is the exotic cuisine offered at this one-of-a-kind restaurant. From lumpia, spiced beef, and fried prawncrackers, to porkloin simmered in ginger sauce and shrimp and peppers in oyster sauce, Royal Thai presents a delectable assortment of customary and innovative Thai fare that you have to taste to believe.

SRC.name: Le Jardinier
SRC.description: Le Jardinier embodies the allure of the beautiful French countryside. Over the centuries, French cuisine has evolved to include many cultural influences and the chefs of Le Jardinier have turned this style of cooking into an art form, allowing guests to indulge in traditional French cuisine in the midst of an island paradise. With the accompaniment of fragrant wines and delectable pastries, simple dishes and haute cuisine draw in guests to this French gem. Unique creations such as the Homard GrillÃ©, grilled Caribbean lobster with garden pea risotto and cherry tomatoes; and the SuprÃªme de Volaille RÃ´ti, roasted chicken breast with cheese polenta, sherry and thyme jus, prove that this restaurant is characterized by meticulous preparation and careful presentation of food. Guests can also indulge in delicious pastries and desserts, a compulsory pleasure that culminates the French dining experience. In both the food and the setting, it is here that guests will find the undeniable romance of Paris.
hours: Breakfast: Will be served in Spices restaurant

SRC.name: Cricketer's Pub
SRC.description: For more than 300 years, pubs have provided a carefree, warm ambiance that afforded comfort to people who wanted to relax with good ale and a good joke after a hard day's work. Pubs are most certainly fundamental to British culture. Samuel Pepys, famous for his detailed 17th century writings, even described pubs as the 'heart of England' With the same vibrant spirit of original British pubs, Cricketer's Pint serves the same purpose as the time-honored public houses of yesteryear where people gathered together to enjoy life and a cold one. A delightful encounter full of good times and customary pub fare awaits pub-goers who seek the welcoming experience of a traditional, British pub.

SRC.name: Bella Napoli Pizzeria
SRC.description: Whether a made up recipe or a selection from the menu, a whole lot of thinking goes into deciding which delectable pizza combination will be the best choice. Nothing says comfort food better than a warm slice of brick-oven pizza made fresh with mozzarella cheese, homemade tomato sauce, and tasty herbs and toppings. Bella Napoli hits the spot anytime of day or night with oven-baked bread and choice toppings including, jerk chicken, black forest ham, seafood, and even ripe banana and dark chocolate toppings for the savory dessert pizza.

SRC.name: The Mariner
SRC.description: Discover the New Take on Anytime Dining. From the very beginning, The Mariner Seaside Bar & Grill has proven to be something special. A place where guests come for delicious, grilled food and a cold one, this beachside bar and grill doesn't disappoint. With traditional grilled delights such as grilled fish and beef burgers, a commonality among guests is to first enjoy the mouthwatering, flavorful food, and then take pleasure in a peaceful walk along the beach. Guests can also enjoy wraps, French fries, salad, and local favorites including Jerk Chicken and Jerk Pork where peppery jerk and fiery scotch bonnet spices are used to season these local treasures. With a laidback vibe characteristic of the Caribbean, this come-and-go grill is goodtime fun for everyone.

SRC.name: Jerk Shack
SRC.description: Discover The Good Kind of Jerk. Smack dab in the middle of the private offshore island of Sandals Cay, the Jerk Shack offers up the very best in jerk-a cooking style native to Jamaica where meats are rubbed or marinated with a spicy mixture that contains allspice (pimento) and fiery Scotch Bonnet peppers. Served alongside seasoned market veggies and rice-and peas infused with coconut-jerk chicken, jerk pork, and grilled fish are the stars of this laidback bamboo shack. The food variety offered here incorporates some of Jamaica's most distinctive flavors including cloves, cinnamon, scallion, thyme, garlic and also, bammy (deep-fried cassava), and callaloo.

SRC.name: Spices
SRC.description: Discover the Spice of Life. For a true island restaurant experience, there's Spices. With its tropical surroundings, festive hospitality, and exceptional wines and spirits, it's the perfect entrÃ©e into Pan-Caribbean cuisine. With delicious breakfast options and ever-changing daily lunch buffet themes with plenty of made-to-order options, Spices brings flavors from all around the world to one place. At night, Spices transforms to a Pan-Caribbean restaurant offering dishes infused with popular Caribbean spices like pimento, nutmeg and cinnamon. The character of Spicesâ expansive seaside deck is charming, as guests can watch the sailboats passing, see the fiery sunset, or simply bask in the cool sea breeze while they savor the flavors of a flagship restaurant and toast to the distinct character of this lively seaside eatery nestled right on sparkling Caribbean Sea.

SRC.name: La Tavola
SRC.description: In Italy, the kitchen table, or tavola, is the center of family life. From everyday meals to festive occasions, the Italian table is always laden with a seemingly endless array of homemade dishes prepared with farm fresh ingredients and a healthy dose of grandma's amore. At la Tavola, we make our dishes the exact same way, so you can share in the comfort, cuisine and camaraderie found around every Italian table!

SRC.name: Bombay
SRC.description: With a unique collection of intriguing, flavorful dishes, Bombay Club is the go-to place for scenic views, great times, and exotic fare. The mere mention of the city of Bombay conjures up images of ancient open-air markets buzzing with activity that heightens the senses -tables laden with shimmering silks, racks hung with geometrically patterned rugs, gleaming silver and copper vessels and, at the heart of it all, baskets overflowing with a multi-hued array of aromatic Indian spices, like cardamom, chili peppers, ginger, coriander, saffron and nutmeg. In like manner, the sweet smells of fragrant herbs and the vibrancy of a bustling market are inextricably linked with Bombay Club. Enjoy the intriguing ambiance while savoring piquant favorites, including Shrimp Pakoras, Vegetable Samosas, Butter Chicken and more.

SNG.name: Bayside
SNG.description: With flavorsome International cuisine, guests from near and far enjoy the decadence of Bayside by day for buffet-style breakfast and lunch featuring ever-changing daily buffet themes and plenty of made-to-order options. Bask in its outdoor essence with dining by night with an exquisite a la carte Mediterranean dinner menu of specialties from France, Italy and Spain.Â  The character of Baysideâs open-air setting is charming, as guests can watch the sailboats passing, indulge in candlelit dinners, see the fiery sunset, or bask in the cool sea breeze. Savor the flavors of a flagship restaurant and toast to the distinct character of this lively seaside eatery, nestled just a short distance from the sparkling, Caribbean Sea.

SNG.name: Sundowner
SNG.description: Sundowner makes for a perfect dining experience where romance and good food abound. From Jamaica's national dish Ackee and Saltfish, to the Bahamas' famous Conch Salad and St. Vincent's Pelau (chicken sautÃ©ed in brown sugar and cooked with tomato, peas and rice) Sundowner offers a sundry selection of Caribbean eats that tease the taste buds. Here, guests can relax in the laidback charm of a beachside gem while admiring sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea and the island's best sunset on an age-old veranda that has been preserved throughout the years.

SNG.name: Kimonos
SNG.description: Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to the majestic extravagance of Kimonos, a vibrant restaurant that serves up the exotic cuisines of the Far East in a most interactive and impressive way. You never know what new tricks and treats the chefs have up their sleeves, possibly juggling cooking utensils, flipping a shrimp tail into their shirt pocket, or catching a shiitake mushroom in their hat. Choose from entrees that incorporate teriyaki beef, ginger-infused chicken breast, and peppery shrimp or enjoy palatable salad, soups, or beef gyozas. The unparalleled views of a tropical garden are enhanced by the appetizing flavors of this place.

SNG.name: Barefoot by the Sea
SNG.description: Located in the heart of Jamaica's 'Capital of Casual', along the famous stretch of 7-mile beach, Barefoot is one of the few establishments you can actually show up...barefoot, digging your toes into the fluffy, white sand while enjoying delectable seafood. With the sparkling Sea just steps away, spectacular Caribbean vistas and cool Sea breezes abound. The cuisine here is just as enticing as the charming, Caribbean vibe, presenting distinctive seafood recipes full of savory fervor. Lobster Bisque with Sourdough Croutons, Herb-Crusted Mahi Mahi, and Coconut-Fried Tiger Shrimp are just a few of the tantalizing options that grace Barefoot's palatable menu. Stimulate your desire of a long-awaited romantic evening under the stars at Barefoot, an unforgettable place for a celebration of any kind, especially the kind made of romance.

SNG.name: Bella Napoli Pizzeria
SNG.description: Whether a made up recipe or a selection from the menu, a whole lot of thinking goes into deciding which delectable pizza combination will be the best choice. Nothing says comfort food better than a warm slice of brick-oven pizza made fresh with mozzarella cheese, homemade tomato sauce, and tasty herbs and toppings. Bella Napoli hits the spot anytime of day or night with oven-baked bread and choice toppings including, jerk chicken, black forest ham, seafood, and even ripe banana and dark chocolate toppings for the savory dessert pizza. On the surface, Bella Napoli may look like a traditional pizza place but upon closer examination, the pizza variety offered here reveals itself to be extremely unique with flavor contrasts that are sure to whet the palate of pizza lovers from around the world.

SNG.name: Brava
SNG.description: Experience the diversity and creativity of Spanish cuisine at Brava, our new open-air Tapas restaurant situated on Negril's spectacular 7-mile beach just steps away from the Caribbean Sea. Celebrate the social and festive spirit of the Spanish people as you sip a refreshing SangrÃ­a and indulge in a variety of Spain's most popular sharing plates.

SNG.name: Crema
SNG.description: Crema, our coffee and ice cream shop, is inspired by Jamaica and its Blue Mountains, and offers only locally-grown, harvested, and roasted Jamaican coffee beans exclusively for our guests. Jamaica not only has, arguably, the best coffee in the world but also a tradition in making ice cream. Working with our local communities we have sourced Jamaicans' favorite flavors for Crema. Unique to Crema is the affogato, a combination of both coffee and ice cream - the perfect mid-day or late-night indulgence. There are no clear facts about where and when the affogato was created, but the espresso machine was invented in the 19th century in Italy. Affogato translates in English "drowned." The mixture of sweet cold cream with espresso is one experience not to pass on.

SNG.name: Perla
SNG.description: A jewel of a restaurant by the sea, Perla is a shining example of Latin and Caribbean fusion. Dine on mouth-watering tacos filled with succulent meats and fresh produce or taste refreshing ceviche bursting with flavor. Pair your meal with a craft cocktail infused with tequila or rum and you're all set for lunch or a casual dinner. Indulge in the rich and vibrant flavors of the islands and let us transport you to a tropical paradise right here by the beach.

SGO.name: Vista Sky
SGO.description: Delicate flavors require careful preparation, so at Vista Gourmet, we treat fish and seafood with the respect it deserves. After spending the day delighting in a true Garden of Eden encompassing over 100 acres, Vista Gourmet is the ideal place to unwind and conclude an eventful (or relaxing) day. When guests are ready for refreshment and succulent seafood selections, this restaurant with a terrace offering spellbinding views of the Caribbean Sea is the perfect reprieve. Feeling the steady Ocho Rios breeze is inevitable while lounging at Sky Terrace, Vista Gourmet's outdoor dining area that sits high up on a rocky cliff.

SGO.name: Valentino's
SGO.description: Set amidst lush mountains, legendary waterfalls, and exotic, secret gardens, Ocho Rios is a stunningly beautiful paradise dotted with hidden gems-and Valentino's is one such jewel. Bordered by the Caribbean Sea, Valentino's brings the distinct flavors Tuscany to a picturesque landscape, topped off with great wines and an intimate dining setting. Enjoy a hearty meal that warms the soul, with unique seafood and chicken creations from the refined palate of Tuscany.

SGO.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SGO.description: There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant tucked behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Oriental dÃ©cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. Giving guests a taste of the Far East with traditional and contemporary sushi creations, Soy is named after soy sauce, a customary ingredient in the art of sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Chefs skillfully prepare sushi using only the freshest ingredients. Guests can enjoy a nightcap or pre-dinner cocktail near the stone-lined fire pits, and inside, will discover great ambiance with the stone statues, pendant lighting, and mahogany furniture.

SGO.name: The Reef Terrace
SGO.description: All the flavors of the Caribbean come together in one remarkable restaurant with unparalleled views. Take a journey across the islands to sample the best Pan-Caribbean cuisine, all served on a cliffside terrace with a magnificent view over the sea. Dining beneath the stars is not just how it's done in the tropics - it's the epitome of romance. Taste the flavorful temptations of the Caribbean. Start off with a bowl of Jamaican Spice Pepper Pot soup, a Jamaican favorite with chicken, vegetables and callaloo, followed by Spicy Jamaican Wood-fired Snapper, served with scalloped potatoes and cinnamon braised plantains.

SGO.name: The Southern Table
SGO.description: Once limited to home kitchens with mothers and grandmothers as the keepers of family recipes, the Southern cooking style has long been esteemed, producing delicious and wholesome cuisine perfect for sharing with a group of people. In the American South, a warm welcome is a way of life and the best taste of Southern hospitality is experienced around a table with kin and good friends. At the Southern Table, even strangers will feel like family when sharing a tall drink and delicious comfort foods that incorporate simple, garden-grown ingredients.

SGO.name: Neptune's
SGO.description: Neptune, the Roman god of water and the sea, is one of the most well known deities of Roman mythology. It's said that his powers are at the core of Neptunes, our Mediterranean seafood restaurant - and after dining here, you just might believe the old tale rings true. For years, the chefs of Neptunes have made it their mission to provide the most authentic reflection of Mediterranean heritage through robust menu offerings and a sundry setting. From the splendor of the rustic, open-air restaurant design, to the beauty of the turquoise sea, guests are offered a true, coastal Mediterranean experience directly on the beach, against the backdrop of the beautiful Jamaican Riviera.

SGO.name: Manor House
SGO.description: By the beginning of the 16th century, manor houses, or country houses as they were called, gained popularity among the high social class. The Manor House restaurant pays tribute to this sophisticated standard, as guests are treated like royalty. What's more, the beauty of the varying vistas are nothing short of stately. But the true regality of the Manor House is, of course, found in the splendid cuisine. Only innovative Jamaican-Caribbean dishes are served at the Manor. Enjoy unique creations such as the Tranquility, Red Stripe marinated scallops wrapped in seasoned cabbage with yam cake and mango jerk emulsion.
SGO.short_description: Discover Fare Fit For A King

SGO.name: Kelly's Dockside
SGO.description: With an unmatched ambience and irresistablely luscious fare, Kelly's Dockside is the ultimate in dining al fresco. You'll marvel at the spectacular views, the lantern lighting, and the delectable cuisine of this over-the-water restaurant. Kelly's is not only situated in an ideal location, but it also boasts sumptuous delights from land and sea that are just as idyllic. It won't take long to realize the charm of this serene, seaside bar and grill...and be sure to take a romantic stroll to the end of the pier to view the fiery Ocho Rios sunset. And best of all, guests can indulge in selections from the innovative Kelly's menu. From perfectly seasoned meats and seafood, to delectable sides and desserts, flavorful combinations with the sauces to accompany them abound.

SGO.name: Great House CafÃ©
SGO.description: Named after the 18th century Caribbean mansions of yesteryear, the Great House CafÃ© is welcoming, lighthearted, and the quintessential place to enjoy a quick snack, light meal, or to feed your yearning for a Jamaican delight. Each menu item pays tribute to the diversity and flavor of Jamaica. From hot-off-the-grill favorites including jerk chicken, to Cajun-dusted French fries, hot sandwiches, and Jamaican patties, the cuisine and atmosphere of the Great House CafÃ© is always bursting with flavor and excitement.

SGO.name: Tapas on the Riviera
SGO.description: Legend has it that tapas originated in Spain with King Alfonso the 10th who for a time, was only allowed to take in small portions of food with small amounts of wine. Guests of Tapas on the Riviera can delight in this age-old tradition of enjoying small plates of food with their favorite wine and spirits. Spanish food, and especially tapas, is based on simple methods and the imaginative use of seasonal vegetables and local ingredients. Tapas on the Riviera is no different except that here, tapas selections are inspired by the cuisine of regions all around the world. Ingredients are fresh and flavors are robust.

SGO.name: The Mariner
SGO.description: In ancient times, it was the mariner who set the course of a journey, navigating the ship across the sea and through ports of call. At The Mariner Seaside Bar & Grill, you can navigate your way through a menu of delicious options hot off the grill, or that you can serve yourself. From light snacks to full midday meals, you'll find a diverse array of options to satisfy any craving and feed your hunger.
SGO.short_description: Discover A Grill With Seaside Seating

SGO.name: Dino's Pizzeria
SGO.description: Create your own personal pizza masterpiece or choose one of the Dino's signature blends. Made-to-order pizza combinations range from the traditional margherita to the Calabrese and Hawaiian pizzas, all made with the same long-leavening, high-quality dough. With so many toppings to choose from, this place stays abuzz with guests vying for the opportunity to try every single pizza combination on the menu...and even make up a few of their own. With its charming outdoor seating just steps from the beach, Neapolitan-style pizza doesn't get any better than this at Dinos Pizzeria - or as many guests call it, Pizza Heaven.

SGO.name: Kimonos
SGO.description: Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to the majestic extravagance of Kimonos, a vibrant restaurant that serves up the exotic cuisines of the Far East with an interactive twist. You never know what new tricks and treats the chefs have up their sleeves, juggling cooking utensils, flipping a shrimp tail into their shirt pocket, or catching a shitake mushroom in their hat. Kimonos boasts mouthwatering cuisine prepared by skillful chefs who entertain with tricks while cooking on an iron, flat surface grill, as guests await their exotic fare.

SGO.name: Le Gourmand
SGO.description: Chefs of Le Gourmand are trained in the art of cooking with the contemporary French cooking style. Some of the finest cuisine in the world comes from France - blend this with the beautiful Caribbean setting of Le Gourmand and it's easy to see that no other French dining experience is quite like this. Le Gourmand serves up an artistic dining experience worthy of its name. Enjoy the sleek modern ambience, signature drinks, unforgettable wines, and rich fare. This welcoming gathering spot with its elegant dÃ©cor lets guests discover his or her own inner gourmand!
SGO.short_description: Discover The Allure of France Cuisine

SGO.name: Bella Napoli Pizzeria
SGO.description: Whether a made up recipe or a selection from the menu, a whole lot of thinking goes into deciding which delectable pizza combination will be the best choice. Nothing says comfort food better than a warm slice of brick-oven pizza made fresh with mozzarella, homemade tomato sauce, and tasty toppings. Bella Napoli hits the spot anytime of day or night with oven-baked bread and choice toppings including, Gorgonzola, pear, Brie, prosciutto, sausage, artichokes, seafood and even ripe banana and dark chocolate toppings for the savory dessert pizza.

SGO.name: The Jerk Shack
SGO.description: For generations, jerk has been a cherished culinary art of Jamaica, and now, jerk's pungent flavor and irresistible aroma have made it a worldwide favorite. With open-air seating and a rustic vibe, the Jerk Shack serves up authentic jerk with all the traditional accompaniments. A Caribbean experience is not complete until you've tasted this Jerk hut's luscious offerings. To find it, just follow the mouthwatering sweet 'n' peppery scent wafting in the air!

BRP.name: Le Papillon
BRP.description: Spellbinding and elegant, Le Papillon combines the fresh produce of Jamaica with the classic techniques and traditions of France's finest establishments to evoke an abundance of delicious flavors. Meaning "the butterfly" in French, this unique restaurant features an emergence of classic French cuisine. From the butterfly show plates and the opulent dÃ©cor, to the enticing scent of the fresh baguettes on the table, Le Papillon offers guests a taste of customary French splendor. Here, amidst cut-velvet wallpaper imported from France, guests enjoy superb cuisine such as Carre d'Agneau, an herb crusted rack of lamb. Even the restaurant's signature drink, L'Aphrodisiaque is a blend of St. Remy VSOP brandy, Cointreau, pineapple juice, cranberry juice and Sprite.

BRP.name: The Terrace
BRP.description: Discover An Assortment of Flavor. Sitting elevated, in the heart of Jamaica's Ocho Rios region, The Terrace provides guests with an ideal respite complete with jaw-dropping views and exquisite, gourmet cuisine. In the great outdoor setting of The Terrace, the Caribbean Sea appears to be just within reach and the colorful foliage makes the serene venue even more romantic. Indoors, the layout is that of traditional Great House with a gracious entryway and spacious dining area with massive French doors that celebrate the view and lead out to the stunning terrace where the stars bring to life the night's energy.

BRP.name: Royal Grill
BRP.description: Making its mark on the stunningly beautiful Ocho Rios region, Royal Grill overlooks a white-sand beach and dazzling turquoise waterscape with the undulating mountains gleaming in the distance. In order to match the superb excellence of its surroundings, Royal Grill offers equally impressive fare. Blending the comfort of a feel-good, laid-back ambiance with exotic grilled foods, this one-of-a-kind grill has made an immediate and outstanding impression on guests.

BRP.name: Tea Terrace
BRP.description: Discover an Afternoon Pastime. The history of tea dates back to the 17th century and is one of the most iconic English food customs - a custom influenced by the wife of Charles II, Catharine of Braganza. The tradition of afternoon teatime, which became popular in the 1800s, thrives today at Tea Terrace, a quaint tea bar that offers guests a late afternoon teatime experience. The Tea Terrace celebrates the love of tea with time-honored traditions passed on to the Caribbean islands from Great Britain. The Tea Terrace proves to be a place that expresses the true qualities and characteristics of an old, English pastime, as the setting and the experience is characteristically elegant, well structured, and tranquil, with several different tea offerings including black, green, and fruity tea elements. Located in the northern fringes of Jamaica, the small terrace sits in a prime location, overlooking the Caribbean Sea.

BRP.name: Wobbly Peacock
BRP.description: In keeping with the early vision of public houses, Wobbly Peacock is a lively pub with just the right mix of energy and easygoing appeal. Featuring elegant mahogany furnishings, lantern pendant lighting, and a grand piano, the beauty of this place is undeniable. But the main draw for many guests is the amazing gastro pub cuisine and mellow, down-home essence. An impressive list of ales also add to the Wobbly Peacock's authentic pub charm, as this gastro pub serves local and imported beer such as Guinness and Newcastle Brown Ale.

SWH.name: Giuseppe's
SWH.description: Discover the Perfect Pairing. Giuseppe's makes guests feel right at home-right along the Caribbean Sea. With inviting indoor and outdoor seating, this cozy Italian restaurant brims with genuine Tuscan charm. Dine amid the candlelit ambiance of its outdoor terrace or step inside for a taste of warm, old country allure. Here, you'll find the joys of Italy in the Tuscany-style antipasti bar featuring unique appetizers. From pizza and pasta, to tempting desserts, the food at Giuseppe's is the main attraction. Indulge in pizza made your way and delicious pasta creations likebraised lamb ragout served with penne pasta and fresh zucchini, tomato, and shrimp tossed with linguine pasta.

SWH.name: Jasmine's
SWH.description: Discover Pan-Asian Enchantment. Taking its name from the fragrant flower used in perfumery and tea, Jasmines showcases the colorful flavors of the Orient. It's said that exotic foods are for lovers, and after a romantic dining experience at Jasmines, it will be easy to see why. From the vaulted ceilings to the beautifully textured walls, Jasmines' Asian-inspired dÃ©cor features a sensual ambiance and intimate dining space perfect for two people in love. Dark mahogany accents, bamboo-style chairs; hardwood flooring, and fiery red walls put the finishing touches to the provocative venue. But the main draw for most guests is the tantalizing fare. Specializing in pan-Asian cuisine, the chefs at Jasmines take pride in preparing menu favorites using the exotic, delectable spices and flavors of the Far East.

SWH.name: CafÃ© de Paris
SWH.description: Discover a Little Bit of Paris in the Caribbean. Whitehouse has always been known for its 365 beaches and romantic settings. Now, CafÃ© de Paris is helping to make it known for fine, Parisian treats. When the cafÃ© concept was first introduced in Paris in the 17th century, people fell in love with the neighborhood feel of the cafÃ©, which over the years became a place to relax. The same semblance is found at CafÃ© de Paris, the social pulse of Whitehouse. Flowers, bright colors, and lovely patio furniture with umbrellas adorn the outside of the cafÃ©. But the chic dÃ©cor and romantic ambience aren't the only things to savor at this superb cafÃ©.
SWH.short_description: Discover a Little Bit of Paris in the Caribbean

SWH.name: Eleanor's
SWH.description: Lady Eleanor used her collection of exotic recipes and her massive Georgian dining room to create the most lavish banquets Jamaican colonial society had ever seen. Her recipes cemented her place in culinary history and she became known as the best cook in the Caribbean! Eleanors cuisine is served in an atmosphere reminiscent of Eleanor's very own great house dining room so that her legacy as the best cook in the Caribbean will never be forgotten. The enchanting, old-world charm of Eleanors captivates guests from the moment they walk through the doors. But it's the delectable cuisine inspired by this 18th century matriarch that leaves a lasting impression with a calypso of flavors such as Tamarind Grilled Beef Tenderloin (tamarind-infused red wine reduction), Roasted Pumpkin Soup, Caribbean Grilled Lobster, Jamaican Jerk Chicken, West Indian Curried Lamb, and Rasta Pasta (penne pasta tossed with chef's choice of vegetables, ackee, spinach, and coconut cream sauce).

SWH.name: Bayside
SWH.description: Discover Diversity. The Bayside Restaurant represents the culinary diversity of an equally diverse locale. With flavorsome Caribbean cuisine, guests from near and far can enjoy Bayside by day for buffet-style breakfast and lunch.The character of Bayside's terrace setting overlooking the pier and Caribbean Sea is charming.

SWH.name: Schooner's
SWH.description: Discover a Taste of Jamaica. With mesmerizing water views and a tantalizing menu of authentic Jamaican favorites, all your senses will be overcome with joy at Schooner's. As the sun sets over the sea, the ambience shifts to pure romance, where the stars, candles, and tiki torches light the night, and the waves softly lapping against the shoreline provide the perfect soundtrack.

SWH.name: Neptune's
SWH.description: Neptune, the Roman god of water and the sea, is one of the most well known deities of Roman mythology.It's said that his powers are at the core of Neptunes, our Mediterranean seafood restaurant - and after dining here, you just might believe the old tale rings true. With casual European elegance, the Neptune-blessed cuisine highlights the best in Mediterranean fare. Eggplant, artichokes, squash, tomatoes, legumes, onions, mushrooms, okra, cucumbers, and herbs are used to embellish three course meals of fresh seafood such as lobster, mussels, octopus, shrimp, salmon, tuna. Traditional delights such as feta lamb kebabs, tzatkiki, and saffron-infused Bouillabaisse are tantalizing temptations. You'll marvel at sea vistas just within reach, the sweeping views, the inviting, laidback atmosphere, and the divine desserts; but most of all, you'll laud enticing cuisine said to be touched by a god.

SWH.name: The Jerk Shack
SWH.description: Discover Authentic Jamaican Jerk. Believed to have originated with Jamaica's Arawak Indians, jerk cookery began as a preservation method. The Maroons of Jamaica, who once sought refuge in the island's Blue Mountains, eternalized the Arawak's ancient jerk technique by spicing or seasoning the meat, wrapping it in leaves, then placing it on hot rocks over a lattice of wood. This technique evolved with the use of different spices to the cooking style that we know today as Jerk. At the Jerk Shack, chefs apply the jerk cooking style using a marinade or paste that incorporates pimento (allspice) and scotch bonnet peppers.

SWH.name: Sushi on the Sand
SWH.description: Sandals South Coast Jamaica is making sushi lovers happy with the debut of Sushi On The Sand, a seaside restaurant offering fresh rolls, sashimi, salads and more alongside beautiful views of the Caribbean Sea. Sushi On The Sand brings Far East fare to this Luxury IncludedÂ® resort as part of Sandals Resorts 5-Star Global Gourmet dining.

SWH.name: Chick'N Dippers
SWH.description: The ultimate destination for chicken lovers, serving up chicken tenders in the heart of Jamaica's luxurious South Coast, Chick'N Dippers is a quick, casual, and fun experience for our guests to enjoy on the beach. Our tenders are locally-sourced, made fresh, juicy, and crispy. Each tender is seasoned with our secret blend of herbs and spices and dipped in your choice of sauces.

SWH.name: Taquiero
SWH.description: Taquiero food truck sits right on the beach offering a delicious Mexican-style lunch. Tacos are made for perfect days on the beach - light and flavorful with a bit of spice. Order at the counter and take to your beach lounger or get a table and take in the sea views. Â¡Saludos!

SDR.name: Dunn's Rum Club
SDR.description:
Here, the island spirit is alive and well, shaken and stirred into authentic Jamaican craft cocktails and expertly mixed with locally-sourced ingredients like coconut and sorrel smoked rum. 

Sample traditional flavors in a range of delectable bar snacks and small plates. Indulge in smooth selections from our curated list of rums, challenge one another to a spirited round at the pool tables, or try your luck in a game of Jamaican-rules dominoes, where the best out of six wins.

SDR.name: Jerk Shack
SDR.description: Believed to have originated with Jamaica's Arawak Indians, jerk cookery began as a preservation method. The Maroons of Jamaica, who once sought refuge in the island's Blue Mountains, eternalized the Arawak's ancient jerk technique by spicing or seasoning the meat, wrapping it in leaves, then placing it on hot rocks over a lattice of wood. This technique evolved with the use of different spices to the cooking style that we know today as Jerk. At the Jerk Shack, chefs apply the jerk cooking style using a marinade or paste that incorporates pimento (allspice) and scotch bonnet peppers.

SDR.name: Cascata
SDR.description: This Italian restaurant is peppered with lush, romantic dÃ©cor that is distinctly unpretentious with European charm.
SDR.short_description: Savory Italian Dishes In A Charming Ambiance

SDR.name: Hanami
SDR.description: Subtle yet inviting, this izakaya-inspired sushi restaurant takes the alluring elegance of traditional Japan to the Caribbean. Sushi is made with the freshest ingredients, Hanami's artful and authentic nod to Japanâs world-renowned dish has guests wanting more.
SDR.short_description: The freshest and most delectable sushi

SDR.name: Banyu
SDR.description: Immerse yourself in an unforgettable journey to Asia and experience each country in the plates served by this eclectic restaurant. From Thailand to Japan, enjoy a blend of cultures all in a single menu.
SDR.short_description: Experience The Exotic Flavors Of The Orient

SDR.name: L'Amande
SDR.description: Indulge in a taste of France with freshly picked ingredients from the heart of Jamaica. Infused with the classic cooking techniques found in the finest establishments in France, L'Amande is an exquisite mÃ©lange of French delicacy and Jamaican fare.

SDR.name: Galene
SDR.description: Relax by the shore with delicious grilled delights and savory island staples that will have you coming back for more.

SDR.name: Edessa
SDR.description: The Caribbean meets the Aegean at Edessa, an elegant restaurant named for the ancient city of abundant waters. Savor fresh, Greek-inspired flavors in a warm, relaxed setting overlooking the aquamarine sea, where breakfast and dinner are served daily.

SDR.name: Zuka
SDR.description: Travel across Central and South America through these regions' amazing cuisine. The menu includes delicacies that have been recreated with authentic ingredients. Relish in these Latin American culinary traditions and flavors inside the vibrant, tropical environment or outdoors in a retro space.
SDR.short_description: Discover the Flavor of South America

SDR.name: BLUM
SDR.description:
Linger over a fresh cup of coffee at an authentic cafe inspired by the Blue Mountains where 
the beans were grown, harvested, and roasted exclusively for our resort. Here, you can savor a selection of artisan coffees ranging from espresso drinks, to Japanese-style and nitro cold brew, or enjoy island inspired treats imbued with local flavor. 

Start the morning with traditional pastries filled with Jamaican chocolate and spices, paired with a pour over coffee that lets the bean's essence bloom slowly for a rich and flavorful cup. Or, take a break with an iced coffee and Jamaican patty. In this casual and relaxed setting, it's easy to get lost in conversation, or simply in the moment, as you take sip after delicious sip.

SDR.name: Saltaire
SDR.description: Feel the salty breeze and listen to the waves washing the white-sand coastline at Saltaire. This open-air eatery offers a diverse set of culinary options for breakfast and lunch. Set right by the ocean, this is the spot to enjoy a meal with Caribbean appeal.
SDR.short_description: International Flavors In An Open-air Eatery

SDR.name: Isola Pizzeria
SDR.description: Known as "island" in Italian, you can sink your teeth freshly baked pies the magnificent "isola" in the Caribbean. Made with the finest ingredients and custom made to your liking with succulent sauce, crispy crust and mouthwatering toppings come together for best tasting pizza you've ever had by the sea.

SRB.name: La Plume
SRB.description: A delicate balance of flavors creates the most exquisite French cuisine at La Plume. Indulge in a warm atmosphere, inviting you to savor the evening.
SRB.short_description: Experience French Cuisine is a Sophisticated Setting

SRB.name: Butch's Island Chop House
SRB.description: Ever since he opened the first Sandals resort, the name Gordon "Butch" Stewart has been synonymous with high-quality, luxury destinations. Butch's Steak & Seafood serves up only the highest quality grain-fed Midwestern beef together with the finest fish and seafood. Our hand-cut steaks, fish fillets and seafood are prepared your way, seasoned to perfection and accompanied by exquisite sides and flavorful sauces. Once you experience our unparalleled quality and luxury ambience you'll understand why we had to name it Butch's!

SRB.name: Tesoro
SRB.description: A fitting complement to its menu of traditional Southern Italian pastas, the centerpiece of this expansive Italian eatery is its open exhibition stone pizza oven, serving up made-to-order Neapolitan style pizzas by day and delicious artisan breads by night.

SRB.name: Kanoo
SRB.description: A celebration of all things Caribbean, feel the rhythm of the music and savor the spice at Kanoo. Enjoy Pan-Caribbean dishes infused with colorful culture that brings passion to the evening and throughout the night.
SRB.short_description: A Celebration Of All Things Caribbean

SRB.name: Kimonos
SRB.description: Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to Kimono's, a vibrant restaurant that serves up Japanese cuisine in a most captivating manner. Kimono's boasts mouthwatering cuisine prepared by skillful chefs who entertain with tricks while cooking on an iron, flat surface grill in front of their guests' eyes. You never know what new tricks and treats the chefs have up their sleeves, whether it be juggling cooking utensils, flipping a shrimp tail into their shirt pocket, or catching a shiitake mushroom in their hat! At Kimonos eating is only half the fun.
SRB.short_description: Experience Japanese Cuisine and Entertaining Chefs

SRB.name: Aralia House
SRB.description: Caribbean-accented eats featuring fresh seafood from boat to table. From local Bahamian dishes to other island staples, at Aralia House you can enjoy authentic Caribbean cuisine.
SRB.short_description: Experience Seafood With A Caribbean Flair

SRB.name: Calico CafÃ©
SRB.description: At this casual beachside grill, you'll be able to stop by throughout the day, take in the turquoise Caribbean Sea and munch on hearty comfort foods such as burgers and fresh salads.
SRB.short_description: Experience a Beachside Grill with Amazing Views

SRB.name: The Queen's Pearl
SRB.description: Belly up at this cozy pub, offering a menu filled with authentic and traditional British classics. At The Queen's Pearl, enjoy good drinks and a good time.

SRB.name: Gordon's on the Pier
SRB.description: Gordon's On The Pier restaurant is an upscale eatery that takes grilled meat and seafood specialties to a new culinary level. Located at the tip of the resort's pier surrounded by azure blue waters, Gordon's offers panoramic ocean views from a romantic seaside setting.
SRB.short_description: Exquisite Seafood Surrounded By The Ocean

SRB.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SRB.description: Tucked away behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Asian dÃ©cor, Sandals Resorts brings a taste of the Far East to the Caribbean. Named after Soy Sauce, a traditional ingredient in the art of Sushi, Soy offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made to order. Skillfully prepared using only the freshest and most delectable ingredients, it's no wonder why Soy is such a popular option amongst our guests.

SRB.name: Coco Queen
SRB.description: At Coco Queen, the smell of salty air paired with flavorful concoctions is the epitome of island life. Indulge in delicious, Bahamian fusion cuisine under the shade of swaying palms, including locally-inspired tacos and fresh seafood.
SRB.short_description: Experience The Essence Of The Caribbean

SRB.name: Sweets 'N' Tings
SRB.description: Start your morning or break up your day with Sweets 'N' Tings grab-and-go treats and coffee drinks. Choose from our signature crÃªpes or create your own with your choice of delicious toppings. Just another way to sweeten your vacation.

SLS.name: Spices
SLS.description: For a true island restaurant experience, there's Spices. With its tropical surroundings, festive hospitality, and exceptional wines and spirits, it's the perfect entrÃ©e into Caribbean and Mediterranean cuisine. From succulent seafood and Greek style salad to spicy pizza and Jamaican jerk favorites, there's a wide range of selections to satisfy any palate. With delicious breakfast options and themed buffet-style dining throughout the day and night, Spices brings flavors from all around the world to one place. At night, Spices transforms to a Caribbean restaurant offering dishes infused with popular Caribbean spices like nutmeg and cinnamon.

SLS.name: Kimonos
SLS.description: Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to the majestic extravagance of Kimonos, a vibrant, restaurant that serves up the exotic cuisines of the Far East with an interactive twist. The mid-1940 Teppanyaki cooking style used here is one indication to guests that they're in for a truly memorable experience. With dim lighting, red accents, and Asian-inspired mahogany-framed windows modeled after the fascinating Shoji sliding screens of East Asia, the dÃ©cor of Kimonos is exotic, mysterious, and comforting, all at the same time. Despite the lively atmosphere, there's also a Zen quality that thrives in the midst of it all - the uncluttered space and undressed walls maintain an open, flowing sensibility. Kimonos boasts mouthwatering cuisine prepared by skillful chefs who entertain while cooking on an iron, flat surface grill, as guests eagerly await their exotic fare.

SLS.name: Cucina Romana
SLS.description: Situated in an idyllic open-air location with magnificent views, Cucina Romana has a culinary legacy that stretches back to ancient Roman times. Only the best ingredients are used at Cucina Romana, where the chef skillfully creates inspiring Italian favorites from Rome and its home region of Lazio. From antipasti and salads, to pasta favorites, Cucina Romana is the ideal dining experience for anyone who wants to broaden their appreciation of fine wine and authentic Italian cuisine.

SLS.name: Neptune's
SLS.description: With casual European elegance, the Neptune-blessed cuisine highlights the best in Mediterranean fare. Eggplant, artichokes, squash, tomatoes, legumes, onions, mushrooms, okra, cucumbers, and herbs are used to embellish three course meals of fresh seafood such as lobster, mussels, octopus, shrimp, salmon, tuna. Traditional delights such as feta lamb kebabs, tzatkiki, and saffron-infused Bouillabaisse are tantalizing temptations. You'll marvel at sea vistas just within reach, the sweeping views, the inviting, laidback atmosphere, and the divine desserts; but most of all, you'll laud enticing cuisine said to be touched by a god.
SLS.short_description: Discover The Bounty Of The Sea

SLS.name: Butch's Chophouse
SLS.description: Making its debut against the stunningly beautiful Grenadian backdrop, Butch's Chophouse is the quintessential place to enjoy prime cuts of meat in the Caribbean. Designed with the ultimate comfort and relaxation in mind for guests, Butch's Chophouse is adorned with plush furnishings, exposed roof trusses, wood finishes, and intimate pendant and tea lighting, reminiscent of a cozy lodge. This elegant steakhouse, a Sandals first, features the finest cuts of juicy beef made your way, seasoned to perfection, and accompanied by exquisite sides and flavor-boosting sauces. Bordered by the picturesque waterscape and hillside, this restaurant encompasses everything you'd want in a steakhouse: delicious, juicy steaks with just the right touch of ambiance and local flavor.

SLS.name: Tipsy Turtle Pub
SLS.description: A delightful encounter full of good times and customary pub fare awaits pub-goers who seek the welcoming experience of a traditional, British pub. Tipsy Turtle Pub-home to rustic, saloon-like dÃ©cor and lively bartenders-is a great place to completely relax and enjoy customary pub fare. Offering Shepherd's Pie, Fish and Chips, Bangers and Mash, and more, scrumptious pub food can be paired with a wide range of beers, wines, spirits, and soft drinks. Inviting, with cozy seating for two or for your whole group, it's hard to leave this place.

SLS.name: Cafe de Paris
SLS.description: CafÃ© de Paris is giving it a reputation for fine, Parisian treats. When the cafÃ© concept was first introduced in Paris in the 17th century, people fell in love with the neighborhood feel of the cafÃ©, which over the years became a place to relax. The same ambience is found at CafÃ© de Paris, the pulse of Grenada's mornings, mid-afternoons, and evenings. Flowers, bright colors, and stylish patio seating adorns the outside of the cafÃ©. But the rustic-chic, French-inspired dÃ©cor and romantic atmosphere aren't the only things to savor at this superb cafÃ©.
SLS.short_description: Discover A Little Bit Of Paris

SLS.name: Dino's Pizzeria
SLS.description: Nothing says comfort food better than a warm slice of brick oven pizza made fresh with mozzarella, homemade tomato sauce, and tasty toppings. Dino's Pizzeria hits the spot anytime of day or night with oven-baked bread and choice toppings including Gorgonzola, pear, Brie, prosciutto, sausage, artichokes, seafood and more. On the surface, Dino's may look like a traditional pizza place but when you take a closer look, you'll find an incredible variety of pizza with some of the most unique combination of flavors sure to whet the palate of true pizza lovers.
SLS.short_description: Discover A Little Slice Of Heaven

SLS.name: Le Jardinier
SLS.description: Le Jardinier means "the gardener" in French, and given this restaurant serving French cuisine that feels like a romantic garden paradise shaped and cared for by a skillful gardener, the name is perfect. Le Jardinier embodies the allure of the beautiful French countryside. Its exquisite setting is accented by exotic plants, fresh flowers and classic country furniture. With the accompaniment of fine wines and delectable pastries, simple dishes and haute cuisine draw in guests to this French gem.

SLS.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SLS.description: There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant adorned with unique Oriental dÃ©cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. Giving guests a taste of the Far East with traditional and contemporary sushi creations, Soy is named after soy sauce, a customary ingredient in the art of sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Chefs skillfully prepare sushi using only the freshest ingredients. Guests can enjoy a nightcap or pre-dinner cocktail at the bar, where you will discover great ambiance with the stone statues, pendant lighting, and mahogany furniture. When it comes to sushi, Soy has plenty of answers. Sample delicacies like the Champagne Lobster, a guest favorite with blanched lobster, avocado, daikon sprouts and soy yuzu paper.

SBD.name: Bombay Club
SBD.description: With a unique collection of intriguing, flavorful dishes, Bombay Club is the go-to place for scenic views, great times, and exotic fare. The mere mention of the city of Bombay conjures up images of ancient open-air markets buzzing with activity that heightens the senses -tables laden with shimmering silks, racks hung with geometrically patterned rugs, gleaming silver and copper vessels and, at the heart of it all, baskets overflowing with a multi-hued array of aromatic Indian spices, like cardamom, chili peppers, ginger, coriander, saffron and nutmeg. In like manner, the sweet smells of fragrant herbs and the vibrancy of a bustling market are inextricably linked with Bombay Club. Enjoy the intriguing ambiance while savoring piquant favorites, including Chicken Tikka, Poppadums, Butter Chicken, Lamb Samosas and more.

SBD.name: Butch's Chophouse
SBD.description: Butch's Chophouse, named after Sandals Resorts Chairman Gordon "Butch" Stewart, serves up only the highest quality grain-fed Midwestern beef, hand-selected from top quality Black Angus and Wagyu steers. Carefully-aged, artisan hand-cut steaks are prepared your way - seasoned to perfection and accompanied by exquisite sides and flavorful sauces. Once you experience the unparalleled quality and luxury ambiance, you'll understand why this splendid steakhouse is named Butch's!
SBD.short_description: Discover A Cut Above The Rest

SBD.name: CafÃ© de Paris
SBD.description: Discover a Little Bit of Paris in the Caribbean. Like the elegant patisseries that line the narrow cobbled streets of Paris, the first impression of CafÃ© de Paris is cozy and familiar - small bistro tables with umbrellas set at jaunty angles line the terrasse, leading up to a stuccoed facade with tall, arched French doors. As you enter CafÃ© de Paris, aromas of freshly baked pastries and Jamaica Blue Mountain Blend coffee linger in the air; a welcome greeting that beckons you in. Behind a counter laden with sweet breads, croissants, cakes and much, much more, one friendly server makes espresso and specialty coffee while the other prepares the crÃªpes. The temptation to devour one of everything is almost too great to resist until you remember that CafÃ©; de Paris is open all day, every day, so you can stop in and relax with a cup of coffee and a croissant whenever you like. In the true spirit of a typical French patisserie, CafÃ© de Paris becomes a pampered lifestyle rather than a singular indulgence.

SBD.name: Dino's Pizzeria
SBD.description: When Sandals first decided to open a brick-oven pizzeria, Dino Cavallo, a master pizza chef from Naples, Italy, was appointed to train Sandals chefs to make the most authentic Italian pizzas. He did such a great job that the pizzeria is named after him - and the rest is history. Dino's lets guests create their own personal pizza masterpieces or choose one of the pizzeria's signature blends. Pizza combinations range from the traditional to locally inspired favorites, all made with the same long-leavening, high-quality dough. With so many toppings to choose from, this place stays abuzz with guests vying for the opportunity to try every single Neapolitan-style pizza combination on the menu. For the feel of an old, Roman street scene blended with the historic charm of the Caribbean, guests need not look any further than Dino's Pizzeria, or as many guests call it, Pizza Heaven!
SBD.short_description: Discover a Little Slice of Heaven

SBD.name: Merry Monkey
SBD.description: Paying homage to the world-famous British pub comes Sandals Barbados own Merry Monkey Pub. Down a pint of Newcastle Brown as you indulge in British gastro pub fare. With cozy traditional dÃ©cor you'll feel as if you've ventured across the Atlantic and entered into another reality completely. Pubs are most certainly fundamental to British culture. Samuel Pepys, famous for his detailed 17th century writings, even described pubs as the 'heart of England. With the same vibrant spirit of original British pubs, the Merry Monkey serves the same purpose as the time-honored public houses of yesteryear where people gathered together to enjoy life and a cold one.

SBD.name: Kimonos
SBD.description: Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to Kimono's, a vibrant restaurant that serves up Japanese cuisine in a most captivating way. Kimono's boasts mouthwatering cuisine prepared by skillful chefs who entertain with cookery tricks right before your very eyes! Awaken your senses with the mouthwatering scents of steaming seasoned meats and veggies fresh off the iron grill. Whether your chef juggles cooking utensils, flips a shrimp tail into his shirt pocket, or catches a shiitake mushroom in his hat, it's clear to see that Kimono's eating is only half the fun.

SBD.name: Portofino's
SBD.description: Italy's fabled resort town of Portofino in the northern region of Liguria has long been a seaside playground of the rich and famous, lured there by lush green hills that cascade into azure Mediterranean waters. As evidence of Portofino's rich culinary culture, al fresco eateries with excellent cuisine and grand vistas abound. At Portofino's restaurant the warm, open-air atmosphere and the tantalizing scents of Ligurian cuisine wafting from the open exhibition kitchen offer up an authentic taste and feel of this idyllic seaside town.
SBD.short_description: Discover the Liguria Region of Italy

SBD.name: Schooner's
SBD.description: Tantalize your taste buds with the very freshest seafood around in this nautically themed restaurant mere feet away from the beach. Dine outdoors on our wooden planked deck to the glow of golden candles. You'll soon be carried away by the tastes and the undeniable allure of the wide open ocean. With an emphasis on the flavors of Barbados, locally inspired favorites populate the menu.
SBD.short_description: Discover The Flavors Of The Ocean

SBD.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SBD.description: There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant tucked behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Oriental dÃ©cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. Giving guests a taste of the Far East with traditional and contemporary sushi creations, Soy is named after soy sauce, a customary ingredient in the art of sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Guests can enjoy a nightcap, pre-dinner cocktail, sushi and sake amid the great ambiance of stone statues, pendant lighting, and mahogany furniture. When it comes to sushi, Soy has plenty of answers. Sample signature delicacies and hang out in the intimate booths, the perfect spot for a romantic evening for two.

SBD.name: Spices
SBD.description: With flavorsome International cuisine, guests from near and far enjoy the decadence of Spices by day for buffet-style breakfast and lunch; and bask in its outdoor essence with dining by night for an exquisite a la carte dinner. The character of Spices open-air setting is charming, as guests can watch the sailboats passing, indulge in candlelight dinners, see the fiery sunset, or bask in the cool sea breeze. It's the place to indulge your palate with ever-changing daily buffet themes and plenty of made-to-order options. Savor the flavors of a flagship restaurant and toast to the distinct character of this lively seaside eatery, nestled just a short distance from the sparkling, Caribbean Sea.

SBD.name: The Mariner
SBD.description: Discover the new take on Happy Hour. From the very beginning, The Mariner Seaside Bar & Grill has proven to be something special. A place where guests come for delicious grilled food and a cold one, this beachside bar and grill doesn't disappoint. Traditional delights like grilled fish and burgers are available alongside French fries, salad, locally-inspired favorites and more. With a laidback vibe characteristic of the Caribbean, this come-and-go grill is good-time fun for everyone. The Mariner offers the perfect atmosphere for people to enjoy a great midday snack or pre-dinner nibble,or their favorite island cocktail as they delight in the gentle ocean breeze. Perched along the beach at water's edge, this bustling bar & grill offers good eats & good times.
SBD.short_description: Discover A New Take On Happy Hour

SBR.name: Butch's Steak & Seafood
SBR.description: Ever since Sandals Resorts' Chairman opened his first resort, the name Gordon ''Butch'' Stewart has been synonymous with high-quality, luxury destinations.  Butch's Steak & Seafood serves up only the highest quality grain-fed Midwestern beef together with the finest fish and seafood.  Our hand-cut steaks, fish fillets and seafood are prepared your way, seasoned to perfection and accompanied by exquisite sides and flavorful sauces.  Once you experience our unparalleled quality and luxury ambience you'll understand why we had to name it Butch's!

SBR.name: Chi Asian Fusion
SBR.description: These are few meanings of the Chinese concept of chi, an ancient belief shared with its East Asian neighbors Korea, Japan and Vietnam. Nourishing one's chi, or life force, is essential to maintaining good health. At Chi, we've created a unique concept that marries sustenance and the enjoyment of great cuisine with the importance of balance, harmony and wellness. Restore your life force at Chi.

SBR.name: American Tavern
SBR.description: Many people believe Americans just eat hot dogs and hamburgers, but America has a rich, hidden culinary culture that lives in the hills and hollers of small towns across the nation.  By uniting cultures from all four corners of the Earth, the American Melting Pot blended together many global cuisines, giving rise to some of the most unique, delicious regional comfort foods in the world. To experience these beloved dishes in their native settings would take a lifetime, but American Tavern's contemporary American menu brings updated regional comfort foods together in one place, so that you can explore and celebrate America's rich culinary heritage without ever having to leave your table.

SBR.name: La Parisienne
SBR.description: The perfect place to indulge in fine, French cuisine. Revel in the contemporary ambience, delightfully progressive menu, and impeccable service. The chic gold and silver accent walls, French inspired art, modern furniture, and mouthwatering cuisine rivals any of the finest restaurants located in the French capital. Dine indoors or outside on the terrace, overlooking the crystal clear waters of the Caribbean Sea and the main resort pool. With fresh baguettes on the table, the aroma of exquisitely prepared cuisine, and more than a hint of romance in the air, you just might forget for a moment that you're not in Paris.
SBR.short_description: Discover the Spirit of France at La Parisienne

SBR.name: Neptune's
SBR.description: Neptune's evokes images of the Roman god of the sea casting his trident over the waters and conjuring the freshest fish and seafood from the abyss.  Neptune's is an al fresco, seaside restaurant that boasts low lights, star-filled skies and the gentle lapping of waves that mingle with the aromas and tastes of the Mediterranean rim - simple, flavorful cuisine in a stunning seaside setting.

SBR.name: Jerk Shack
SBR.description: For generations, jerk has been a cherished culinary art of Jamaica, and now, jerk's pungent flavor and irresistible aroma have made it a favorite worldwide. With open-air seating and a rustic vibe, the Jerk Shack serves up authentic jerk with traditional accompaniments. A Caribbean experience is not complete until you've tasted this Jerk hut's luscious offerings. To find it, just follow the mouthwatering sweet 'n' peppery scent wafting in the air!

SBR.name: Sweet n' Salty's Gourmet Donuts & Coffee
SBR.description: Now you can enjoy gourmet, old-fashioned cake donuts and coffee made fresh daily at Sandals first ever gourmet donut shop - Sweet n' Salty's Gourmet Donuts & Coffee. With unique flavor combinations that are plenty sweet and a pinch salty, they're sure to please any donut enthusiast. At Sandals, all you need is love (and donuts)!

SBR.name: Heart & Sol
SBR.description: Far from an ordinary deli, Heart & Sol combines the variety, speed and service of a NY deli with the fresh, clean, healthy foods required to attain complete wellness. We use locally-sourced, farm-to-table fruits and vegetables to create fresh, light soups and salads, healthy sandwiches, energy-boosting smoothie bowls, and nutrient-packed fresh fruit and vegetable smoothies and juices. Whether you have time to stop and relax a while or need to grab and go, Heart & Sol is the perfect complement to your wellness plan.

SBR.name: Greenhouse
SBR.description: One of the most important pillars of overall wellness is a diet of clean, nutritious foods. As part of our commitment to wellness we present The Greenhouse, a rustic farm-to-table eatery offering colorful, elegant cuisine prepared with locally sourced, farm-to-table fruits and vegetables, meats and seafood. Thanks to the strong partnerships weâve nurtured with local, small-scale Barbadian farmers, every dish at The Greenhouse is brimming with seasonality, unparalleled quality, the most delicious flavors and straight-from-the-garden freshness. Several plant-based options are available as a healthy alternative.

SHC.name: Kelly's Dockside
SHC.description: Featuring lantern lighting, glowing chandeliers, and wide panel hardwood floors, Kelly's Dockside has an ambiance that is unmatched and luscious fare that no one can resist. Guests marvel at the spectacular views as well as the enticing cuisine of this over-the-water restaurant. Kelly's Dockside is not only situated in an ideal location, but it also boasts cuisine that is just as idyllic, fusing seafood favorites with Saint Lucia's delectable Creole cookery. It won't take long to realize the charm of this serene, seaside bar and grill where guests can marvel at the fiery Saint Lucia sunset.

SHC.name: Kimonos
SHC.description: Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to the majestic extravagance of Kimonos, a vibrant restaurant that serves up the exotic cuisines of the Far East in a most interactive and impressive way. The mid-1940 Teppanyaki cooking style used here is one indication to guests that they're in for a truly memorable experience. With dim lighting, red accents, and Asian-inspired mahogany windows modeled after the fascinating Shoji sliding screens of East Asia, the dÃ©cor of Kimonos is ever so slightly exotic and mysterious, yet comforting at the same time.

SHC.name: Mario's
SHC.description: Italian gastronomy is made up of 20 diverse regional cuisines. Mario's draws its cooking style from the beautiful region of Tuscany, where E.A.. Mario, grandfather to the restaurant's first authentic Italian chef, was born to a family of humble means in the northern Italian region of Lombardia. Growing up in a family of six in a small apartment behind his father's barbershop, everyone in his family needed to pull their weight to get by. Mario was in charge of preparing dinner and his delicious dishes would bring his whole family together every night. Mario instilled that same sense of passion for his love of food and family into his children and grandchildren. That is why guests today feel and taste that same passion in the tantalizing cuisine of Mario's restaurant.
SHC.short_description: Discover The Lombardia Region Of Italy

SHC.name: Bayside
SHC.description: With flavorsome International cuisine, guests from near and far enjoy the decadence of Bayside by day with an al a carte style breakfast and themed al a carte lunches, and bask in its outdoor essence with dining by night for an exquisite a la carte French Brasserie experience. The character of Bayside's outdoor setting is charming, as guests can watch the sailboats passing, indulge in candlelit dinners, or see the fiery sunset; while indoor dining sets the tone for a more fanciful allure with French windows serving as the gateway to welcome in the cool, Sea breeze. Bayside is the place to indulge your palate with ever-changing daily buffet themes and plenty of made-to-order options.

SHC.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SHC.description: There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant tucked behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Oriental dÃ©cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. Giving guests a taste of the Far East with traditional and contemporary sushi creations, Soy is named after soy sauce, a customary ingredient in the art of sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Chefs skillfully prepare sushi using only the freshest ingredients. Guests can enjoy a nightcap or pre-dinner, sake-infused cocktail or martini near the stone-lined fire pits, and inside, will discover great ambiance with the stone statues, pendant lighting, and mahogany furniture.

SHC.name: The Beach Bistro
SHC.description: The Beach Bistro bears the name of one of the Caribbean's most noteworthy attributes--sandy, picturesque beaches. At this oceanfront paradise, guests marinate in the warmth of the sun, sand, and Sea and relax and enjoy the peacefulness and friendly faces of a quaint eatery. Guests from all over come to take pleasure in the laidback charm and good eats of this delightful restaurant.

SHC.name: Isola
SHC.description: Known as "island" in Italian, you can sink your teeth freshly baked pies the magnificent "isola" in the Caribbean. Made with the finest ingredients and custom made to your liking with succulent sauce, crispy crust and mouthwatering toppings come together for best tasting pizza you've ever had in the Caribbean.
SHC.short_description: DISCOVER A LITTLE SLICE OF HEAVEN

SLU.name: Buccan
SLU.description: At Buccan, we believe fire is a primal source of creation and connection. Our chefs use ancient, hearth-based techniques to prepare local Saint Lucian meats and produce. Every ingredient is sourced from the islandâs fertile volcanic soil, which is rich in mood-boosting magnesium and potassium. Communal seating will pair your party with other guests, creating an opportunity to share food, drink, and stories among open-air scenery. Bold, organic, connectiveâthis is a dining experience not to be missed.
SLU.short_description: An Immersive, Fixed-Menu, Family-Style Dinner Awaits You

SLU.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SLU.description: Sushi bar with its simple Oriental themed decor and its magnificent preparation of only the freshest and most delectable sushi. Located next to Kimonos.

SLU.name: The Pavilion
SLU.description: Romantic ambience, impeccable service, and scintillating cuisine makes The Pavilion a grand dining adventure. This Saint Lucian gem is a blend of exquisite dÃ©cor, spellbinding romance, and scrumptious cuisine, with domed ceilings, massive columns, beautiful mosaic tiling, and unsurpassed ocean vistas from anywhere in the restaurant. Enjoy a lavish buffet spread for breakfast and a delectable Ã¡ la carte menu of international dining options for lunch and dinner.

SLU.name: La Toc
SLU.description: Romance is an important part of the equation at this delightful restaurant featuring Parisian-inspired cuisine that is paired with the finest selections of wines from the world's most celebrated vineyards. The menu presents a long list of interesting variety with French cuisine that is both mouthwatering and idealistic. At La Toc, you'll find some of the finest and most innovative dishes including sea scallops laced in Chablis cream and baked in a puff pastry, and savory pan-roasted duck served with chanterelle mushrooms in port wine sauce. The quality, diversity and elegance of La Toc is only matched by the intimacy and richness of the cuisine.
SLU.short_description: Discover The Allure Of French Cuisine

SLU.name: Kimonos
SLU.description: Cross the threshold of this dramatic, Japanese-inspired building and enter an environment that melds the very best of the orient with the gorgeous island ambiance of St. Lucia. Tucked into the side of a sheer cliff, this two-story restaurant offers magnificent views of the spot-lit ocean through walls of wood-encased square-pained glass, the perfect accompaniment to sizzling teppanyaki dishes, whipped up with flair, fanfare and laughter by an entertaining chef.

SLU.name: Armando's
SLU.description: Armando's serves specialties from his home region of Campania, such as the mouthwatering linguine and clams in white wine sauce, 'Linguine Alle Vongole' and 'Pollo Alla Cacciatore', chicken stewed with tomatoes, rosemary, and white wine. Each menu item, including the Godfather, the restaurant's specialty cocktail, a blend of whiskey and amaretto, showcases the dedication the culinary team puts into making each dish and drink authentically Campania. The open-air atmosphere of the outdoor seating area and the cozy indoor setting welcomes guests, inviting them to stay and enjoy time with their significant other, and even, newfound friends.

SLU.name: Neptune's
SLU.description: Neptunes, a Mediterranean seafood restaurant located in Saint Lucia's  verdant capital. From the splendor of the rustic, open-air restaurant design, to the beauty of the turquoise sea in the distance, guests are offered a true, coastal Mediterranean experience against the backdrop of the beautiful Caribbean.
