With casual European elegance, the Neptune-blessed cuisine highlights the best in Mediterranean fare, where eggplant, artichokes, squash, tomatoes, legumes, onions, mushrooms, okra, cucumbers, and herbs are used to embellish three course meals that incorporate fresh seafood such as lobster, mussels, octopus, shrimp, salmon, tuna, and also traditional delights such as feta lamb kebabs, tzatkiki, and saffron-infused Bouillabaisse.

SLU.name: Bella Napoli Pizzeria
SLU.description: Bella Napoli hits the spot anytime of day or night with oven-baked bread and choice toppings including, Gorgonzola, pear, Brie, prosciutto, sausage, artichokes, seafood and even ripe banana and dark chocolate toppings for the savory dessert pizza. Made-to-order pizza combinations range from the traditional margherita to the Calabrese and Hawaiian pizzas, all made with the same long-leavening, high-quality dough. With so many toppings to choose from, this place stays abuzz with guests vying for the opportunity to try every single pizza combination on the menu...and make up a few of their own.

SLU.name: The Pitons
SLU.description: The Pitons Restaurant is a rustic, open-air restaurant that offers breathtaking views of the beach and ocean, and features a grand circular dining room beneath a stunning cone-shaped wooden dome, which resembles one of the island's twin, natural wonders. The Piton Restaurant menu is inspired by a combination of French, British and Indian fare, a diverse medley stemming from the Caribs and the Arawaks who lived on the island originally, surviving off of the land's bountiful natural fruits and vegetables such as mango, orange, tangerine, avocado and breadfruit. Against the backdrop of a most picturesque setting, The Pitons Restaurant is the perfect way to savor Saint Lucian delights.

SLU.name: Cricketer's Pub
SLU.description: Cricketer's Pub - home to rustic, saloon-like dÃ©cor and lively bartenders - is a great place to completely relax and enjoy customary pub fare. Offering Shepherd's Pie, Fish and Chips, Bangers and Mash, and more, scrumptious pub food can be paired with a wide range of beers, wines, spirits, and soft drinks. Inviting, with cozy seating for two or for your whole group, it's hard to leave this place. It was the pub that first introduced the concept of the bar counter being used to serve beer. This 'pie and pint' pub however, brings a whole new meaning to pub life by offering a wide selection of refreshing ales including Guinness and Newcastle Brown ale, as well as time-honored pub fare and delectable desserts all within the beautiful setting of Saint Lucia's enchanting joie de vivre.
SLU.short_description: Discover A Little Bit Of England

SGL.name: Bayside
SGL.description:
By day, Bayside offers a vibrant international buffet for breakfast and lunch, set against sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy a relaxed, open-air setting with fresh flavors and global favorites.
By night, Bayside transforms into a charming French Brasserie, bringing the elegance and comfort of French cuisine to the island. Bayside is more than dining; itâs a celebration of French flavors, island charm, and the warmth of Caribbean hospitality.

SGL.name: Toscanini's
SGL.description: Toscanini's restaurant takes its name from famed Italian conductor Arturo Toscanini who was renowned for his intensity, perfectionism and his passion for his craft. The same qualities are represented in the fine, Italian cuisine at Toscanini's. You'll find exquisite wines that pair perfectly with the succulent specialties of the Emilia-Romagna region of Italy, including the signature dish Lasagna al Forno all'Emiliana-along with other Italian favorites. With all the wine you can drink, scrumptious desserts, and a beautiful, down-home setting, Toscanini's is full of comfort, romance, style, and of course, delicious Italian cuisine.

SGL.name: Josephine's
SGL.description: Inspired by Saint Lucia's most famous scion and Napoleon's empress, Josephine's is a gourmet crÃªperie serving authentic French crÃªpes and delicious desserts. Sweet and savory treats such as crÃªpes stuffed with chicken and spinach and mouthwatering apple and oat crumbles make this one-of-a-kind eatery a must-visit for guests that crave the sweetest things in life. The buzz-worthy Josephine's offers enchanting French dÃ©cor, making it the perfect place to recharge on quiet mornings and relax during the mid-afternoon, and the ultimate place to savor the finest in French Patisserie and delicious coffee. Situated poolside amid Saint Lucia's lush greenery, Josephine's no doubt, provides a warm welcome to all guests, carrying them from simple delight to the sweet life in just seconds!

SGL.name: Barefoot By The Sea
SGL.description: The sandy pathways of Barefoot By The Sea create the casually sophisticated ambience of this charming restaurant, where you're invited to dine barefoot. Dig your toes into the soft, white sand while savoring delectable, create-your-own-dish fare. With the sparkling sea just steps away, there's no better way to dine Caribbean style. The cuisine here is just as enticing as the charming, Caribbean vibe, presenting distinctive seafood offerings full of savory flavor. Mahi Mahi, Red Snapper Fillet, and Char-grilled Strip Loin Steak, are just a few of the tantalizing options that grace Barefoot's palatable menu.
hours: Lunch: 11:00 am - 4:30 pm (Lunch offers various snacks, burgers & sandwiches)

SGL.name: Olde London Pub
SGL.description: A delightful encounter full of good times and gastro pub fare awaits pub-goers who seek the welcoming experience of a British pub. Olde London Pub-home to mahogany, saloon-like dÃ©cor, antique mirrors, clipper-ship wall paper, and lively bartenders-is a great place to completely relax and enjoy upscale, gastro pub fare. Offering Fish and Chips, Cottage Pie, Bangers & Mash, and more, scrumptious gastro pub food can be paired with a wide range of beers, wines, spirits, and soft drinks.

SGL.name: Gordon's on the Pier
SGL.description: Experience the warmth, comfort, and pleasures unexpected at Gordon's on the Pier. Located atop a magnificent pier and offering an innovative twist to popular seafood delicacies, this outdoor restaurant is perfect for romantic dinners for two. Upon arrival, you'll glimpse the beauty of this remarkable destination with panoramic vistas of Saint Lucia's famed Rodney Bay. Colorful Caribbean accents come to life in the vibrant dÃ©cor, flickering mounted lanterns, open exhibition kitchen, and Gordon's signature steak and seafood delights. The culinary team works diligently to create culinary treasures using the best of what's in season. Dedicated to great dining, romance, innovation, and relaxation, the dining experience at Gordon's is an event not soon forgotten...especially for seafood.

SGL.name: Dino's Pizzeria
SGL.description: When Sandals Resorts first decided to open a brick oven pizzeria, we appointed Dino Cavallo, a master pizza chef from Naples, Italy, to create the pizzeria and train our chefs to make the most authentic Italian pizzas. He did such a great job that we named the pizzeria after him - and the rest is history! After all, nothing says comfort food better than a warm slice of brick oven pizza made fresh with mozzarella, homemade tomato sauce, and tasty toppings. Dino's Pizzeria hits the spot day or night, with oven-baked bread and choice toppings.
SGL.short_description: Discover A Little Slice Of Heaven

SGL.name: The Jerk Shack
SGL.description: Believed to have originated with Jamaica's Arawak Indians, jerk cookery began as a preservation method. The Maroons of Jamaica, who once sought refuge in the island's Blue Mountains, eternalized the Arawak's ancient jerk technique by spicing or seasoning the meat, wrapping it in leaves, then placing it on hot rocks over a lattice of wood. This technique evolved with the use of different spices to the cooking style that we know today as Jerk. At the Jerk Shack, chefs apply the jerk cooking style using a marinade or paste that incorporates pimento (allspice) and scotch bonnet peppers used in Jamaica and brought to St. Lucia.

SGL.name: The Mariner
SGL.description: The Mariner Seaside Bar & Grill is something special. A place where guests come for delicious, grilled food and a cold one, this beachside bar and grill doesn't disappoint. With traditional grilled delights such as grilled fish and beef burgers, guests enjoy the mouthwatering, flavorful food, followed by a peaceful walk along the beach. With a laid-back vibe characteristic of the Caribbean, this come-and-go grill is good time fun for everyone.
SGL.short_description: Discover A New Take On Anytime Dining

SGL.name: Bombay Club
SGL.description: With a unique collection of intriguing, flavorful dishes, Bombay Club is the go-to place for scenic views, great times, and exotic fare. The mere mention of the city of Bombay conjures up images of ancient open-air markets buzzing with activity that heightens the senses - tables laden with shimmering silks, racks hung with geometrically patterned rugs, gleaming silver and copper vessels and, at the heart of it all, baskets overflowing with a multi-hued array of aromatic Indian spices, like cardamom, chili peppers, ginger, coriander, saffron and nutmeg. In like manner, the sweet smells of fragrant herbs and the vibrancy of a bustling market are inextricably linked with Bombay Club.Enjoy the intriguing ambiance while savoring piquant favorites, including Chicken Tikka, Poppadums, Butter Chicken, Lamb Samosas and more.

SGL.name: Kimonos
SGL.description: Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to Kimono's, a vibrant restaurant that serves up Japanese cuisine in a most captivating way. Kimono's boasts mouthwatering cuisine prepared by skillful chefs who entertain with cookery tricks right before your very eyes! Awaken your senses with the mouthwatering scents of steaming seasoned meats and veggies fresh off the iron grill. Whether your chef juggles cooking utensils, flips a shrimp tail into his shirt pocket, or catches a shiitakem mushroom in his hat, it's clear to see that Kimono's eating is only half the fun.

SGL.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SGL.description: There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant tucked behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Oriental d&ecaute;cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. Giving guests a taste of the Far East with traditional and contemporary sushi creations, Soy is named after soy sauce, a customary ingredient in the art of sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Guests can enjoy a nightcap, pre-dinner cocktail, sushi and sake amid the great ambiance of stone statues, pendant lighting, and mahogany furniture. When it comes to sushi, Soy has plenty of answers. Sample signature delicacies and hang out in the intimate booths, the perfect spot for a romantic evening for two.

SCR.name: Butch's Island Chop House
SCR.description: Ever since he opened the first Sandals resort, the name Gordon Butch Stewart has been synonymous with high-quality, luxury destinations. Butch's Steak and Seafood serves up only the highest quality grain-fed Midwestern beef together with the finest fish and seafood. Our hand-cut steaks, fish fillets and seafood are prepared your way, seasoned to perfection and accompanied by exquisite sides and flavorful sauces. Once you experience our unparalleled quality and luxury ambience you'll understand why we had to name it Butch's!
SCR.short_description: Discover a Cut Above the Rest

SCR.name: Zuka
SCR.description: Zuka unites the culinary traditions and flavors of Central and South America in a vibrant, lively setting.

SCR.name: Strand
SCR.description: Strand, Dutch for beach, offers only the freshest fish and seafood in an open-air setting just steps from the sandy shore.

SCR.name: Kanaal
SCR.description: Reminiscent of the numerous cafes that line the canals of Amsterdam, Kaanal Cafe serves up premium coffee, along with pastries, desserts and made-to-order Dutch sweets like Stroopwafels and Puffertjes. Adding savory temptation to sweet, Kanaal Cafe also doubles as a wine and cheese bar, offering a range of delicious Dutch cheeses paired with premier wines by the bottle or by the glass.

SCR.name: Aolos
SCR.description: Named for the ancient Greek Keeper of the Winds, Aolos' open-air design captures the gentle breezes that converge on its seaside setting, creating the perfect backdrop for an authentic Mediterranean dining experience.

SCR.name: Gatsu Gatsu
SCR.description: The Japanese term gatsu gatsu loosely translates into the act of devouring food quickly. Skillfully prepared using only the freshest and most delectable fish and seafood, the exotic sushi creations made to order at Gatsu Gatsu surely won't linger on the plate.

SCR.name: Pietra
SCR.description: A fitting complement to its menu of traditional Southern Italian pastas, the centerpiece of this expansive Italian eatery is its open exhibition stone pizza oven, serving up made-to-order Neapolitan style pizzas by day and delicious artisan breads by night.

SCR.name: Vincent
SCR.description: At Vincent-an homage to the famous Dutch painter, Vincent van Gogh-every dish is a vibrant culinary artwork of modern European fusion presented on a sleek, minimalist canvas.

SCR.name: Toteki
SCR.description: One of the culinary options at our seaside food truck park, Toteki serves delicious CuraÃ§ao favorites from mid-day to late evening.

SCR.name: La Palma
SCR.description: One of the culinary options at our seaside food truck park, La Palma serves delicious Spanish tapas from mid-day to late evening.

SCR.name: Kishi
SCR.description: One of the culinary options at our seaside food truck park, Kishi serves delicious Asian bao buns, bowls and curries from mid-day to late evening.

SAT.name: Bayside
SAT.description: By day, Bayside offers a vibrant international buffet for breakfast and lunch, set against sweeping views of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy a relaxed, open-air setting with fresh flavors and global favorites. By night, Bayside transforms into a charming French Brasserie, bringing the elegance and comfort of French cuisine to the island. Bayside is more than dining; itâs a celebration of French flavors, island charm, and the warmth of Caribbean hospitality.

SAT.name: Mario's
SAT.description: Italian gastronomy is made up of 21 diverse regional cuisines. Mario's draws its cooking style from the beautiful region of Lombardia, where E.A.. Mario, grandfather to the restaurant's first authentic Italian chef, was born to a family of humble means. Growing up in a family of six in a small apartment behind his father's barbershop, everyone in his family needed to pull their weight to get by. Mario was in charge of preparing dinner and his delicious dishes would bring his whole family together every night. Mario instilled that same sense of passion for his love of food and family into his children and grandchildren.
SAT.short_description: Discover The Lombardia Region Of Italy.

SAT.name: Eleanor's
SAT.description: Representing the best in the rich, flavorful fare that the Caribbean is known for, guests also come to Eleanors to relax and enjoy the beauty of the ocean vistas. However, the best of Eleanors is found in the unique dishes and culinary touches the chefs employ here. Eleanors is named after 18th century Scottish noblewoman, Lady Eleanor MacDougal, who sailed to the Caribbean in search of a new life after a fall from grace in her homeland. Eleanor first landed in Antigua and slowly made her way through the Caribbean islands, picking up work as a cook and seamstress as she moved from place to place. Along the way, she wrote down the recipes she learned from local cooks in her journal. Eventually, she made her way to Jamaica, where she caught the eye of a local sugar cane plantation owner who courted and eventually married her.

SAT.name: Barefoot by the Sea
SAT.description: The sandy pathways of Barefoot by the Sea add to the ambiance of this charming seaside restaurant. Located along Antigua's famed Dickenson Bay, Barefoot is one of the few establishments you can actually show up...barefoot, digging your toes into the fluffy, white sand while enjoying delectable seafood. With the sparkling sea just steps away and spectacular vistas of the bay, cool sea breezes abound. The cuisine here is just as enticing as the charming, Caribbean vibe, presenting distinctive seafood recipes and Antiguan favorites full of savory fervor. Antiguan Crab Cake, Beef & Shrimp, Seafood Pasta, and Caribbean Lobster Thermidor - sautÃ©ed chunks of lobster tail with cream sauce, broiled with cheese and served with mashed potatoes and vegetables - are just a few of the tantalizing options that grace Barefoot's palatable menu.

SAT.name: The Drunken Duck
SAT.description: Drunken Duck - home to rustic, saloon - like dÃ©cor and lively bartenders - is a great place to completely relax and enjoy customary pub fare. Offering Shepherd's Pie, Fish and Chips, Bangers and Mash, and more, scrumptious pub food can be paigold with a wide range of beers, wines, spirits, and soft drinks. Inviting, with cozy seating for two or for your whole group, it's hard to leave this place. It was the pub that first introduced the concept of the bar counter being used to serve beer. This 'pie and pint' pub however, brings a whole new meaning to pub life by offering a wide selection of refreshing ales including Guinness and Newcastle Brown ale, as well as time-honogold pub fare and delectable desserts all within the beautiful setting of Antigua's enchanting joie de vivre.

SAT.name: Kimonos
SAT.description:
You never know what new tricks and treats the chefs have up their sleeves, possibly juggling cooking utensils, flipping a shrimp tail into their shirt pocket, or catching a shiitake mushroom in their hat.

Choose from entrees that incorporate teriyaki beef, ginger-infused chicken breast, and peppery shrimp or enjoy palatable salad, soups, or beef gyozas. The unparalleled views of the surrounding Caribbean Sea are enhanced by the appetizing flavors of this place. There will be live entertainment and the perfect balance of liveliness and serenity enjoyed at Kimonos. But more than that, there will be the savory cuisine of a most magical restaurant where eating is only half the fun.
SAT.short_description: Discover A Little Bit Of Japan

SAT.name: OK Corral
SAT.description: Perched over the famed Dickenson Bay, this Tex-Mex restaurant has the perfect combination of hospitality and good mood food. With one of the best Red Bean Chili Soups west of El Paso, and tasty steaks prepared in the spirit of the true south, you'll find every main dish is served with corn on the cob, baked potato or dirty rice, coleslaw, and baked beans. Southwestern fajitas and some of the sweetest treats inspired by the southern territories of the United States also grace the palatable menu. It's easy to find at least one thing here that everyone can enjoy.

SAT.name: Soy Sushi Bar
SAT.description: Sample delicacies like the Orange Blossom, a guest favorite with tuna, crabmeat, and avocado rolled with salmon and topped with Tobiko, mango sauce and unagi sauce. The bar area is popular with groups, while the intimate booths create the perfect setting for a romantic evening for two. With a style as diversified as the inspiring sushi menu, the chefs at Soy are eager to present guests with the varying flavors of the Far East. They share that elegantly balanced essence through their splendid selection of daily specials, soups, sushi, sashimi, and sake.

SAT.name: Courtyard Bistro
SAT.description: Bask in the warmth of the sun and sea at this courtyard eatery, a laid-back bistro. Relax and enjoy the tranquility of the nearby waves embracing the seashore and the romantic promenade setting. The bustling Courtyard Bistro accentuates Antigua's lush surroundings as guests from all over come to take pleasure in the full-of-life charm and savory favorites offered by this enchanting bistro. The breathtaking foliage and beautiful beach are just steps away and only add to the abundant variety of flavors offered here. This beachfront paradise features charming mosaic-style bistro tables and a bustling bar with a backdrop of spectacular vistas. International and island delights such as hot dogs, French fries, sandwiches, fruit plates, salads, burgers, and patties embody the true spirit of the islands. The Courtyard Bistro is a great place to unwind while enjoying an appetizing variety of local and international snacks, a free-spirited vibe, and amazing signature cocktails!

SAT.name: Bella Napoli Pizzeria
SAT.description: On the surface, Bella Napoli may look like a traditional pizza place but upon closer examination, the pizza variety offered here reveals itself to be extremely unique with flavor contrasts that are sure to whet the palate of pizza lovers from around the world. Made-to-order pizza combinations range from the traditional margherita to the Calabrese and Hawaiian pizzas, all made with the same long-leavening, high-quality dough. With so many toppings to choose from, this place stays abuzz with guests vying for the opportunity to try every single pizza combination on the menu...and make up a few of their own.

SAT.name: CafÃ© de Paris
SAT.description: At CafÃ© de Paris, the social pulse of Dickenson Bay. Flowers, bright colors, and lovely patio furniture with umbrellas adorn the outside of the cafÃ©. But the chic dÃ©cor and romantic ambience aren't the only things to savor at this superb cafÃ©. On most mornings, there is a cool breeze in the air, making enjoying a macadamia, amaretto, hazelnut, chocolate, vanilla, or raspberry hot or chilled latte all the more sweeter. Well into the afternoon, delighting in chocolate cream puffs, crÃ¨me brÃ»lÃ©e tarts, cake, cookies and more, is enchanting.
SAT.short_description: Discover The Sweet Side Of Life

SSV.name: Scrimshaw
SSV.description: Chefs designed Scrimshaw to incorporate international flavors with sustainable and locally-fished seafood. St. Vincent is known for its bountiful options. With access to deep waters of the sea, you'll find some menu items cooked or raw. Conch is fished year-round on the island and chefs have created a section on the menu. Standouts are chowder and fritters. Local lobsters are fished eight months out of the year and our first live lobster tanks are presented. A full bar will accompany the clean seafood flavors. Try the Cointreau Ricky, the perfect pairing with a conch salad. Service is unintrusive and elegant.
SSV.short_description: DISCOVER THE BOUNTY OF THE SEA

SSV.name: Butch's Island Chop House
SSV.description: Ever since he opened the first Sandals resort, the name Gordon Butch Stewart has been synonymous with high-quality, luxury destinations. Butch's Island Chop House serves up only the highest quality grain-fed Midwestern beef together with the finest fish and seafood. Our hand-cut steaks, fish fillets and seafood are prepared your way, seasoned to perfection and accompanied by exquisite sides and flavorful sauces. Once you experience our unparalleled quality and luxury ambience you'll understand why we had to name it Butch's!
SSV.short_description: DISCOVER A CUT ABOVE THE REST

SSV.name: Parisol
SSV.description: Nestled on our magnificent beach, ParisolÂ encompasses sense of place, sophistication, and excitement. A mixture of experiences from al fresco dining at the restaurant to laying out in the sun by the pool or beach. Local ingredients and dishes inspire the bites such as Bakes, a local fried dough served with salt fish, and our Callaloo Florentine for breakfast. Entertainment throughout the week is organized to create a relaxed and fun time while sipping through a number of creative cocktails ,including a spritz menu. The view looking out over beautiful Buccament Bay, starring fishing boats and stunning sunsets alike.

SSV.name: Buccan
SSV.description: Feel a sense of wonder. Learn the history of 'Three Stone' cooking. Buccan is a solid fuel restaurant experience for sharing with old and new friends. The centerpiece of Buccan is our hearth and its fire. We will guide you through local 'Vincy' ingredients, from the sea and the local farms. The menu is set by the chefs, a table full of dishes and bites, all which have been roasted or grilled and all made with the intention to enjoy. Sip as the locals do different rums and mixes. There is no wrong way to go about this.

SSV.name: Gatsu Gatsu
SSV.description: The Japanese term gatsu gatsu loosely translates into the act of devouring food quickly. Skillfully prepared using only the freshest and most delectable fish and seafood, the exotic sushi creations made to order at Gatsu Gatsu surely won't linger on the plate.

SSV.name: Sora
SSV.description: Sora is a local bird found throughout the Caribbean. Offering two different dining experiences: during the morning our buffet, and in the evening, Italian-American comfort food. The open kitchen in the room acts as an action station for breakfast, eggs a la minute, local favorite 'Salt Fish Bake' and fresh fruits.  A la carte Italian antipasti, pasta and mains are all skillfully made substituting and supplementing local, fresh ingredients. The result is a uniquely Roman menu with a 'Vincy' balance.

SSV.name: Jerk Shack
SSV.description: Discover Authentic Jamaican Jerk. Believed to have originated with Jamaica's Arawak Indians, jerk cookery began as a preservation method. The Maroons of Jamaica, who once sought refuge in the island's Blue Mountains, eternalized the Arawak's ancient jerk technique by spicing or seasoning the meat, wrapping it in leaves, then placing it on hot rocks over a lattice of wood. This technique evolved with the use of different spices to the cooking style that we know today as Jerk. At the Jerk Shack, chefs apply the jerk cooking style using a marinade or paste that incorporates pimento (allspice) and scotch bonnet peppers.

SSV.name: Blum
SSV.description: Linger over a fresh cup of coffee at an authentic cafe inspired by the Blue Mountains where the beans were grown, harvested, and roasted exclusively for our resort. Here, you can savor a selection of artisan coffees ranging from espresso drinks, to Japanese-style and nitro cold brew, or enjoy island inspired treats imbued with local flavor. Start the morning with traditional pastries filled with Jamaican chocolate and spices, paired with a pour over coffee that lets the bean's essence bloom slowly for a rich and flavorful cup. Or, take a break with an iced coffee and Jamaican patty. In this casual and relaxed setting, it's easy to get lost in conversation, or simply in the moment, as you take sip after delicious sip.

SSV.name: Isola
SSV.description: Known as "island" in Italian, you can sink your teeth freshly baked pies the magnificent "isola" in the Caribbean. Made with the finest ingredients and custom made to your liking with succulent sauce, crispy crust and mouthwatering toppings come together for best tasting pizza you've ever had by the sea.
SSV.short_description: DISCOVER A LITTLE SLICE OF HEAVEN

SSV.name: Imoro
SSV.description: We believe that eating healthy should be easy and enjoyable. That's why Imoro offers a variety of bowls and salads, made with locally sourced ingredients, prepared right in front of you. Choose from our menu of signature bowls, or create your own custom bowl, with over 30 ingredients to choose from. Whether you want a light and refreshing bowl, or a hearty and satisfying one, we have something for everyone. Imoro is the perfect place to eat healthy and feel good!

SSV.name: Crema
SSV.description: Crema, our coffee and ice cream shop, is inspired by Jamaica and its Blue Mountains, and offers only locally-grown, harvested, and roasted Jamaican coffee beans exclusively for our guests. Jamaica not only has, arguably, the best coffee in the world but also a tradition in making ice cream. Working with our local communities we have sourced Jamaicans' favorite flavors for Crema. Unique to Crema is the affogato, a combination of both coffee and ice cream - the perfect mid-day or late-night indulgence. There are no clear facts about where and when the affogato was created, but the espresso machine was invented in the 19th century in Italy. Affogato translates in English "drowned." The mixture of sweet cold cream with espresso is one experience not to miss!

SSV.name: Three Jewels Rum Bar
SSV.description: Three Jewels Rum Bar is a cozy spot in the heart of the resort, offering a number of rum cocktails and rum flights, as well as a locally-inspired Late Night Bites menu. The bartenders serve local and imported rums, and make our signature Planter's Punch with fresh fruit juice, grenadine, bitters and lots of rum. Three Jewels Rum Bar is inspired to bring the flavors, style and music from our home in the Caribbean.
SSV.short_description: A Sanctuary of Rum and Caribbean Vibes

BNG.name: The Mill
BNG.description: Dine splendidly on hearty and delicious fare with a Jamaican accent as you sit beneath the sloped roof of this semi-circular structure, overlooking the Main Pool and ocean beyond. Made in the image of ancient sugar mills, the ruins of which still dot the verdant Jamaican countryside, this charming open-sided venue transports you to another age entirely.

BNG.name: Kimonos
BNG.description: Discover the Perfect Balance. Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to the majestic extravagance of Kimonos, a vibrant restaurant that serves up the exotic cuisines of the Far East in a most interactive and impressive way. The mid-1940 Teppanyaki cooking style used here is one indication to guests that they're in for a truly memorable experience. With dim lighting, red accents, and Asian-inspired windows modeled after the fascinating Shoji sliding screens of East Asia, the dÃ©cor of Kimonos is ever so slightly exotic and mysterious, yet comforting at the same time. Despite the lively atmosphere, there is also a Zen quality that seems to thrive in the midst of it all, as the soothing dÃ©cor maintains an open, flowing sensibility. Kimonos boasts mouthwatering cuisine prepared by skillful chefs who entertain with tricks while cooking on an iron, flat surface grill, as guests await their exotic fare.

BNG.name: El Mariachi
BNG.description: Grill by day, serving up all of your favorite comfort foods, such as burgers, curly fries and hot dogs, all within steps of the always buzzing Pirates Water Park, this rustic spot transforms by evening into an authentic Tex-Mex eatery. By the glow of golden candlelight, fanned by sea breezes wafting in through the open walls, on the perfumed night air, chow down on nachos, quesadillas, fajitas or whatever southwestern specialty satisfies your appetite.

BNG.name: Bar B Q Park
BNG.description: Serving delicious wraps, burgers, jerk chicken and more throughout the day.  Take a quick snack back to your beach chair or enjoy a more leisurely lunch in the open-air patio.

BNG.name: CafÃ© de Paris
BNG.description: Discover a Little Bit of Paris in the Caribbean. When the cafÃ© concept was first introduced in Paris in the 17th century, people fell in love with the neighborhood feel of it, which over the years became a place to relax. The same semblance is found at CafÃ© de Paris, the social pulse of Beaches Negril morning and night. There's a square-lined walkway along a bustling promenade made to resemble the streets of Paris. Flowers, bright colors, and lovely patio furniture with umbrellas adorn the outside of the cafÃ©. But the chic dÃ©cor and romantic ambience aren't the only things to savor at this superb cafÃ©.
BNG.short_description: Discover A Little Bit of Paris

BNG.name: Soy Sushi Bar
BNG.description: Discover the Volcano on the Beaches. There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant tucked behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Oriental dÃ©cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Guests can enjoy a nightcap or pre-dinner cocktail near the stone-lined fire pits, and inside, will discover great ambiance with the stone statues and mahogany furniture. Sample delicacies like the Volcano on the Beaches, a guest favorite with spicy tuna, spicy crabmeat, and sweet soy sauce. With a style that is just as diversified as the inspiring sushi palate, chefs of Soy are eager to present guests with varying flavors of the Far East and share the essence of a consistent house style that is elegantly balanced through their splendid selection of daily specials, soups, sushi, sashimi, and sake.
BNG.short_description: Discover A Little Bit of Japan

BNG.name: Dino's Pizzeria
BNG.description: Featuring hand-tossed pizzas made with the freshest gourmet ingredients and baked crisp in our Woodstone oven.
BNG.short_description: Discover A Little Slice Of Heaven

BNG.name: Jerk Shack
BNG.description: Discover Authentic Jamaican Jerk. Believed to have originated with Jamaica's Arawak Indians, jerk cookery began as a preservation method. The Maroons of Jamaica, who once sought refuge in the island's Blue Mountains, eternalized the Arawak's ancient jerk technique by spicing or seasoning the meat, wrapping it in leaves, then placing it on hot rocks over a lattice of wood. This technique evolved with the use of different spices to the cooking style that we know today as Jerk. At the Jerk Shack, chefs apply the jerk cooking style using a marinade or paste that incorporates pimento (allspice) and scotch bonnet peppers.

BNG.name: Yoyo's
BNG.description: Open every day, from late morning to late evening, Yoyo's offers a unique and delicious variety of self-serve frozen yogurt, gelato and sorbet, as well as a toppings bar featuring fresh fruit and berries, nuts, candies, gummies and sauces. If that sounds too indulgent, Yoyo's has low-fat, non-fat and non-dairy choices, making Yoyo's a worry-free treat for kids and adults alike!

BNG.name: Yaku
BNG.description: Settle into a warm and inviting atmosphere inspired by the vibrant culture of Peru. You will be greeted by contemporary and traditional elements featuring bold colors, natural textures and exquisite artwork. The menu has a similar old-meets-new feel with classic ceviche, sizzling grilled meats, refreshing seafood and vegetable options. The bar menu is equally as impressive with a curated selection of eclectic cocktails, premium liquors and delectable wines. No matter what you're looking for, you will discover the complexity of Peru in its vivid flavors.

BNG.name: Stella
BNG.description: Just steps away from the shore, this al fresco eatery provides a beautiful setting for a la carte breakfast during the day and Italian favorites at night.

BNG.name: Green Machine
BNG.description: Introducing Green Machine food truck, our fresh and fast way to enjoy delicious bowls! We believe that eating healthy should be easy and enjoyable. That's why we offer a variety of bowls, salads, made with locally sourced ingredients, and prepared right in front of you. Guests can choose from our menu of signature bowls, or create their own custom bowl, with over 30 ingredients to choose from. Whether you want a light and refreshing bowl, or a hearty and satisfying one, we have something for everyone. Green Machine is the perfect place to eat healthy, feel good, and have fun right on the beach.
BNG.short_description: Fresh way to enjoy delicious bowls

BNG.name: ChickâN Dippers
BNG.description: The ultimate destination for chicken lovers, serving up chicken tenders in the heart of Negril, Jamaica. Our tenders are locally-sourced, made fresh, juicy, and crispy. Each tender is seasoned with our secret blend of herbs and spices and dipped in your choice of sauces. Our food trucks add a fun casual bite, allowing guests to walk up and interact with the staff placing an order of food.  Chefs prepare the food upon order and deliver to the guests for pick up. Guests can enjoy the tenders at any of the surrounding tables, relaxing at their beach lounge, around the pool or in the comfort of their rooms. ChickâN Dippers is a quick, casual, and fun experience for our guests to enjoy on the beach.

BTC.name: Mario's
BTC.description: Italian gastronomy is made up of 21 diverse regional cuisines. Mario's draws its cooking style from the beautiful region of Lombardia, where E.A. Mario, grandfather to the restaurant's first authentic Italian chef, was born to a family of humble means. Mario was in charge of preparing dinner and his delicious dishes would bring his whole family together every night. Today, guests feel and taste that same passion in the tantalizing cuisine of Mario's restaurant. With dishes inspired by Mario's hometown of Milano, guests can find some of the most authentic Italian food in the world here. Everyone who steps foot in this inviting Turks & Caicos trattoria will enjoy a little bit of Northern Italy in the Caribbean with Mario's old-world dÃ©cor and authentic Italian recipes.
BTC.short_description: Discover The Lombardia Region of Italy

BTC.name: Reflections
BTC.description: From fare inspired by many different cultures, to dishes that incorporate the local cooking traditions of the islands. Reflections features a vast assortment of delicious seafood entrees and well-known favorites like ribs, lamb, grilled mahi, BBQ chicken wings, hamburgers and french fries, as well as island delights including curried goat and jerk pork. True island charm is reflected in the restaurant's atmosphere and gracious service, and the varied buffet options showcase the beauty and flavor of the Caribbean and beyond. The indoor dining experience is akin to enjoying a meal in a lush rainforest or beautiful greenhouse with sky ceilings that usher in the glow of the Caribbean sun by day and the starry island sky by night.

BTC.name: Kimonos
BTC.description: Discover the Perfect Balance. Follow the tantalizing aroma of exotic spices and perfectly grilled delights to the majestic extravagance of Kimonos, a vibrant restaurant that serves up the exotic cuisines of the Far East in a most interactive and impressive way. Kimonos boasts mouthwatering cuisine prepared in the Teppanyaki cooking style by skillful chefs who entertain with tricks while cooking on an iron, flat surface grill. You never know what new tricks and treats the chefs have up their sleeves, possibly juggling cooking utensils, flipping a shrimp tail into their shirt pocket, or catching a shitake mushroom in their hat. Choose from entrees that incorporate teriyaki beef, ginger-infused chicken breast, and peppery shrimp or enjoy palatable salads, soups, or beef gyozas.

BTC.name: Arizona's
BTC.description: Discover Southwestern Flair. Greeted by an eccentric cow horn chandelier, guests not only delight in the down-home atmosphere at Arizona's, but also the trendy fare that appeals to kids and adults alike. Guests can enjoy Southwestern flair and fare alongside robustly flavored global cuisine. This warm, relaxing tavern-style restaurant is so close to the beach, you can hear the waves lapping ashore while enjoying buffet favorites by day and Ã  la carte menu by nightfall. With its inviting and welcoming dÃ©cor and delectable cuisine served in the midst of a tropical paradise, guests will discover traditional and newfound favorites at this popular restaurant that offers something for every member of the family.

BTC.name: Schooners
BTC.description: Indulge in the elegant backdrop, caressing sea breeze, and the exotic cuisine of Schooners, an extraordinary restaurant specializing in regional cuisine and more. Serving up everything from Lemongrass scented Snapper, to a 10 oz. Rib eye, chefs of this restaurant are also sure to incorporate the famous Turks & Caicos mollusk, Conch, into the sundry menu. With its colonial villa setting just steps from the ocean, Schooners offers the best of the fisherman's catch. The pride and joy of this Caribbean region, Turks & Caicos houses the world's only conch farm so it's only fitting that this succulent seafood has made its way into the kitchens of Schooners in the form of palatable conch creations such as the South Caicos Conch Salad with bell peppers, red onion, and fresh lime, and the Hand Dived Local Conch Chowder.

BTC.name: Sapodilla's
BTC.description: Take a break from the kids at this adult-only restaurant featuring exotic and adventurous fare. Enjoy a delicious Venison Steak with Sweet and Sour Blueberry Sauce while taking in the beautiful view of the gardens. Savor favorites including the Coconut Tiger Prawns and Cream of Pumpkin Soup before feasting on a main course seasoned with just the right amount of Caribbean spice. Dine indoors beneath the shimmering crystal chandelier or outdoors on the windswept terrace overlooking the gardens. Whatever you decide, this sophisticated enclave will be the perfect retreat for your romantic evening with your significant other. The exotic fare of Sapodillas begins with delectable starters like the Roast Peking Duck marinated in ginger and soya, which yields a delicate aroma hinting of the amazing flavors to come.

BTC.name: Giuseppe's
BTC.description: Indulge in pizza made your way and delicious pasta creations including braised lamb ragout served with penne pasta and fresh zucchini, tomato, and shrimp tossed with linguine pasta. Tasty delights including Potato Gnocchi and Seared Swordfish Fillet crusted with Parmesan cheese. Chefs ensure that every single dish bursts with delightful flavor. Mouthwatering combinations such as the Herb-Crusted Lamb Chops are served with delectable, savory wines. With inviting indoor and outdoor environments, this cozy Italian restaurant brims with genuine Tuscan charm, encouraging guests to dine amid the candlelit ambiance of its outdoor terrace or step inside for a taste of old country allure. The welcoming atmosphere and alluring setting paired with amazing Italian food and the romantic Caribbean backdrop, make this hidden gem a lovely place to laugh and linger.

BTC.name: Bobby Dee's
BTC.description: Bobby Dee's is a lively restaurant for kids and kids- at-heart. Located within the magical Jolly Roger ship on Pirate's Island, this vibrantly colored diner offers everything a family loves about dining. The dÃ©cor of this enchanting place is made to look like a pirate ship but also has the bubbly dÃ©cor of a 1950s American diner with brightly colored tables and chairs, and checkered flooring. The delightful diner specializes in comfort foods that satisfy guests after a day exploring the 45,000 square-foot Pirates Island Waterpark. From pizzas and mac 'n' cheese, to burgers, fries, chicken nuggets, and other classic favorites, Bobby Dee's has it all, including delightful sweets like cotton candy and other beloved treats. There is truly something for everyone at Bobby Dee's.

BTC.name: Le Petit Chateau
BTC.description: Meaning âthe small castle,â Le Petit Chateau is encircled by tropical foliage and understated beauty. A popular meeting place to enjoy Parisian-inspired cuisine, elegant dÃ©cor, and the finest wine selections from the world's most celebrated vineyards, Le Petit Chateau is modeled after the fascinating manor houses of the 19th century. With romantic dim lighting welcoming guests to the outdoor seating area and warm celadon-hued walls and wrought-iron chandeliers ushering guests indoors, Le Petit Chateau creates a glamorous dining experience and features classic epicurean delights.

BTC.name: CafÃ© de Paris
BTC.description: When the cafÃ© concept was first introduced in Paris in the 17th century, people fell in love with the neighborhood feel of it, which over the years became a place to relax. The same semblance is found at CafÃ© de Paris, the social pulse of Beaches Turks & Caicos morning and night. There's a square-lined walkway along a bustling promenade made to resemble the streets of Paris. Flowers, bright colors, and lovely patio furniture with umbrellas adorn the outside of the cafÃ©. But the chic dÃ©cor and romantic ambience aren't the only things to savor at this superb cafÃ©. On most mornings, there is a cool breeze in the air, making enjoying a macadamia, amaretto, hazelnut, chocolate, vanilla, or raspberry hot or chilled latte all the more sweeter.
BTC.short_description: Discover a little bit of Paris

BTC.name: Bella Napoli Pizzeria
BTC.description: Underneath vibrant blue umbrellas in an open-air piazza behind the Iguana Pool, grab a gleaming teakwood table and get ready for a culinary delight. Order your favorite pizza fresh from our wood-fired oven and eat to your heart's content as you sway to the infectious rhythms of the live calypso music.
BTC.short_description: Discover A Little Slice Of Heaven

BTC.name: Barefoot by the Sea
BTC.description: This extraordinary restaurant prepares a feast for the senses. Savor fresh, local seafood steps away from water's edge. Feel the incredibly soft sand on your toes and take in spectacular panoramic views of the Caribbean sky and soothing sea as you dine with white-glove service at your beck and call.

BTC.name: Cricketer's Pub
BTC.description: Take tour of Ireland's finest pubs without the endless flight and the grey skies above. Enjoy old favorites like fish and chips, Sheppard's pie, and other traditional pub food in an authentic atmosphere. Tap your feet to the music as you enjoy a "sweet" and wash it all down with a pint or two, late into the night.
BTC.short_description: Discover A Little Bit Of England

BTC.name: Dino's Pizzeria
BTC.description: The whole family will enjoy gourmet pizzas created and baked in a wood-fired brick oven.

BTC.name: Soy Sushi Bar
BTC.description: There's nothing quite like the dining experience at Soy Sushi Bar, a quaint restaurant tucked behind bamboo fronds and adorned with unique Oriental dÃ©cor, dim lighting, and fresh, delectable sushi. This remarkable sushi house offers exciting flavors and exotic sushi creations made-to-order. Guests can enjoy a nightcap or pre-dinner cocktail near the stone-lined fire pits, and inside, will discover great ambiance with the stone statues and mahogany furniture. Sample delicacies like the Volcano on the Beaches, a guest favorite with spicy tuna, spicy crabmeat, and sweet soy sauce. With a style that is just as diversified as the inspiring sushi palate, chefs of Soy are eager to present guests with varying flavors of the Far East and share the essence of a consistent house style that is elegantly balanced through their splendid selection of daily specials, soups, sushi, sashimi, and sake.
BTC.short_description: Discover A Little Bit Of Japan

BTC.name: Bayside
BTC.description:
Our signature beach front restaurant, Bayside, has the only second-level lounge overlooking the award winning Grace Bay Beach on Providenciales.

Feast on delicious international specialties at breakfast, lunch and dinner in this charming, open-air restaurant overlooking the scintillating ocean in the distance beyond.

BTC.name: Sky
BTC.description: A soft, steady Turks & Caicos breeze often greets guests of the Sky Lounge. It is this breeze that first draws them in to the beauty of a spellbinding restaurant with equally mesmerizing cuisine. A harmonious blend of Caribbean comfort and elegant European dÃ©cor, this grand and gracious open air, rooftop restaurant is always inviting, welcoming guests to linger on the terrace and admire the incomparable views of the skyline and sparkling waterscape. The Sky Lounge chefs combine the unique spirit of Italy and the Caribbean with palatable Italian cuisine and fresh seafood offerings. With gracious style, exquisite vistas, and inviting, gentle winds, the Sky Lounge Restaurant is an icon of sorts among the stunning Key West Luxury Village scenery.

BTC.name: Neptunes
BTC.description: Offering panoramic views of the Atlantic Ocean, this beach side casual restaurant offers Seafood Pot au Feu and Tuna Nicoise to convey the experience of dining at an elegant but casual seaside bistro. Simple, flavorful seafood in an unparalleled seaside setting.

BTC.name: Jerk Truck
BTC.description: Find the most authentic jerk outside of Jamaica. Set on the beach with open-air seating, the Jerk Truck serves up authentic Jamaican flavors. A Caribbean experience is not complete until you've tasted this Jerk Truck.

BTC.name: Jojo Java
BTC.description: At Jojo Java, grab-and-go from a selection of artisan coffees made from our exclusive Jamaica Blue Mountain Blend coffee. Start the morning with a delicious caffe latte and a traditional pastry, or take an afternoon break with an iced coffee or iced tea.

BTC.name: Mr. Mac
BTC.description: Treat oneâs palate to unique types of Macaroni & Cheese from classic cheddar to more innovative preparations. Â

BTC.name: The Dive
BTC.description: From fresh juices to crisp beers, sip on one of our many ice-cold drinks at The Dive. Want something made just for you? Our talented bartenders can craft a custom concoction for you or your kids. If youâre looking to quench your thirst by the beach, go ahead and immerse yourself at the Dive.

BTC.name: Yoyo Froyo
BTC.description: Open every day, from late morning to late evening, Yoyo's offers a unique and delicious variety of self-serve frozen yogurt and sorbet, as well as a toppings bar featuring fresh fruit and berries, nuts, candies, gummies and sauces. If that sounds too indulgent, Yoyo's has low-fat, non-fat and non-dairy choices, making Yoyo's a worry-free treat for kids and adults alike!

BTC.name: Butchâs Island Chop House
BTC.description:
Welcome to the first-ever Butchâs Island Chop House at Beaches, a new take on luxury dining designed with families in mind. For the first time at any of our resorts, weâre serving dry-aged steaks* displayed in the dining room, alongside the best Midwestern beef, and fresh seafood. On the beverage side, weâve enhanced the experience with a focus on mini-martinis and upgraded wines by the glass*, adding an extra touch of sophistication. This concept blends high-end quality with the vibrant, welcoming energy that makes Beaches unique.
*Dry Aged Steaks and upgraded wine available to purchase
